event = {
	id = 1900
	random = no
	country = REB #(alternatively U56/Vatican)
	persistent = yes
	
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	style = 2

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1914 }
	offset = 15
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = march year = 1963 }

	action = {
		name = ACTION_NAME_OK
		command = { type = setflag which = theatsAssessed }
		
		command = { type = clrflag which = Threat_level_NA } #North America
		command = { type = clrflag which = Threat_level_SA } #South America
		command = { type = clrflag which = Threat_level_EU } #Europe
		command = { type = clrflag which = Threat_level_AP } #Asia-Pacific (including Australia)
		command = { type = clrflag which = Threat_level_AF } #Africa
		
		#3-yr conscription gives 10 belligerence, Partial mobilization gives 30, General mobilization gives 50
		#local threat level 5 allows peacetime partial mobilization
		#Germany at about 70 belligerence after war starts
		
		command = { #1
			trigger = {
				OR = {
					belligerence = { country = USA value = 15 } 
					
					belligerence = { country = CAN value = 35 } 
					
					belligerence = { country = MEX value = 55 } 
					atwar = USA
					atwar = CAN
					atwar = MEX
				}
			}
			type = setflag which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 1
		}
		command = { #2
			trigger = {
				OR = {
					belligerence = { country = USA value = 35 } 
					
					belligerence = { country = CAN value = 55 } 
					
					belligerence = { country = MEX value = 75 } 
					atwar = USA
					atwar = CAN
				}
			}
			type = setflag which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 1
		}
		command = { #3
			trigger = {
				OR = {
					belligerence = { country = USA value = 55 } 
					
					belligerence = { country = CAN value = 75 } 
					
					belligerence = { country = MEX value = 100 } 
					atwar = USA
				}
			}
			type = setflag which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 1
		}
		command = { #4
			trigger = {
				OR = {
					belligerence = { country = USA value = 75 } 
					
					belligerence = { country = CAN value = 100 } 
					
					belligerence = { country = MEX value = 130 } 
					atwar = USA
				}
			}
			type = setflag which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 1
		}
		command = { #5
			trigger = {
				OR = {
					belligerence = { country = USA value = 100 } 
					
					belligerence = { country = CAN value = 130 } 
					
					belligerence = { country = MEX value = 165 }  
					NOT = { region = { region = "Eastern Canada" 	country = CAN data = 1 value = 60 } }
					NOT = { area = { area = "Cuba" 					country = CUB data = 1 value = 80 } }
					NOT = { region = { region = "Canada" 			country = CAN data = 1 value = 110 } }
					NOT = { region = { region = "Western Canada" 	country = CAN data = 1 value = 110 } }
					NOT = { region = { region = "Northern Canada" 	country = CAN data = 1 value = 110 } }
					NOT = { region = { region = "Northeast US" 		country = USA data = 1 value = 110 } }
					NOT = { region = { region = "Southeast US" 		country = USA data = 1 value = 110 } }
					NOT = { region = { region = "Southcentral US" 	country = USA data = 1 value = 110 } }
					NOT = { region = { region = "Midwest US" 		country = USA data = 1 value = 110 } }
					NOT = { region = { region = "Midwest US" 		country = USA data = 1 value = 110 } }
					NOT = { region = { region = "Northwest US" 		country = USA data = 1 value = 110 } }
					NOT = { region = { region = "Southwest US" 		country = USA data = 1 value = 110 } }
				}
			}
			type = setflag which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 1
		}
		command = { #6
			trigger = {
				OR = {
					belligerence = { country = USA value = 130 } 
					
					belligerence = { country = CAN value = 165 }  
					
					belligerence = { country = MEX value = 205 }  
					NOT = { region = { region = "Eastern Canada" 	country = CAN data = 1 value = 30 } }
					NOT = { area = { area = "Cuba" 					country = CUB data = 1 value = 40 } }
					NOT = { region = { region = "Canada" 			country = CAN data = 1 value = 50 } }
					NOT = { region = { region = "Western Canada" 	country = CAN data = 1 value = 50 } }
					NOT = { region = { region = "Northern Canada" 	country = CAN data = 1 value = 50 } }
					NOT = { region = { region = "Northeast US" 		country = USA data = 1 value = 50 } }
					NOT = { region = { region = "Southeast US" 		country = USA data = 1 value = 50 } }
					NOT = { region = { region = "Southcentral US" 	country = USA data = 1 value = 50 } }
					NOT = { region = { region = "Midwest US" 		country = USA data = 1 value = 50 } }
					NOT = { region = { region = "Midwest US" 		country = USA data = 1 value = 50 } }
					NOT = { region = { region = "Northwest US" 		country = USA data = 1 value = 50 } }
					NOT = { region = { region = "Southwest US" 		country = USA data = 1 value = 50 } }
				}
			}
			type = setflag which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 1
		}
		command = { #7
			trigger = {
				OR = {
					belligerence = { country = USA value = 165 }

				}
			}

event = {
	id = 2002
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	TAG = { AFG ALB ALG ANG ARA ARG ARM AST AUS AZB BEL BEN BHU BLR BOL BOS BRA BRU BUL BUR CAL CAM CAN CGX CHC CHI CHL CMB COL CON COS CRO CSA CSX CUB CXB CYN CYP CZE DDR DEN DFR DOM EAF ECU EGY ENG EQA EST ETH EUS FIN FLA FRA GAB GEO GER GLD GRE GUA GUI GUY HAI HOL HON HUN ICL IDC IND INO IRE IRQ ISR ITA JAP JOR KAZ KOR KUR KYG LAO LAT LBY LEB LIB LIT LUX MAD MAL MAN MEN MEX MLY MON MOR MOZ MTN NAM NEP NIC NIG NOR NZL OMN OTT PAK PAL PAN PAR PER PHI POL POR PRI PRK PRU QUE RHO ROM RSI RUS SAF SAL SAR SAU SCA SCH SCO SER SIA SIB SIE SIK SLO SLV SOM SOV SPA SPR SUD SWE SYR TAJ TAN TEX TIB TRA TRK TUN TUR UKR URU USA UZB VEN VIE WLL YEM YUG U01 U02 U03 U04 U05 U06 U08 U09 U10 U11 U12 U13 U14 U15 U16 U17 U18 U19 U20 U21 U22 U23 U24 U25 U26 U27 U28 U29 U30 U31 U32 U33 U34 U35 U36 U39 U40 U41 U42 U43 U44 U45 U46 U47 U48 U49 U50 U51 U52 U53 U54 U55 U56 U57 U58 U59 U60 U61 U62 U63 U64 U65 U66 U67 U68 U69 U70 U71 U72 U73 U74 U75 U76 U77 U78 U79 U80 U81 U82 U83 U84 U85 U86 U87 U88 U89 U90 U91 U92 U93 U94 U95 U96 U97 U98 U99 USN UIC UTL UAU UPS UCH UBO UCS URO UER UGS UPE UTC }
	
	trigger = {
		flag = theatsAssessed
		local_flag = AllInit
		policy = { type = defense_lobby value = 1 } 
		NOT = { policy = { type = defense_lobby value = 2 } } 
		policy = { type = professional_army value = 1 }
		OR = {
			atwar = yes
			policy = { type = professional_army value = 5 } #2-yr Cons.
			AND = {
				continent = "North America"
				OR = {
					AND = {
						policy = { type = interventionism value = 3 } 
						OR = {
							#flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 2 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 3 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 3 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 3 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 3 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 1 }
						}
					}
					
					#Far away threats
					#flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 4 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 5 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 5 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 5 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 5 }
					
					#closer to home threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 2 }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				continent = "South America"
				OR = {
					AND = {
						policy = { type = interventionism value = 3 } 
						OR = {
							flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 2 }
							#flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 3 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 3 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 3 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 3 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 1 }
						}
					}
					
					#Far away threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 4 }
					#flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 5 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 5 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 5 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 5 }
					
					#closer to home threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 2 }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				continent = "Europe"
				OR = {
					AND = {
						policy = { type = interventionism value = 3 } 
						OR = {
							flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 2 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 3 }
							#flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 3 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 3 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 3 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 1 }
						}
					}
					
					#Far away threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 4 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 5 }
					#flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 5 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 5 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 5 }
					
					#closer to home threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 2 }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				OR = {
					continent = "Asia"
					continent = "Oceania"
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						policy = { type = interventionism value = 3 } 
						OR = {
							flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 2 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 3 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 3 }
							#flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 3 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 3 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 1 }
						}
					}
					
					#Far away threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 4 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 5 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 5 }
					#flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 5 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 5 }
					
					#closer to home threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 2 }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				continent = "Africa"
				OR = {
					AND = {
						policy = { type = interventionism value = 3 } 
						OR = {
							flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 2 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 3 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 3 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 3 }
							#flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 3 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 1 }
						}
					}
					
					#Far away threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 4 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 5 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 5 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 5 }
					#flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 5 }
					
					#closer to home threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 2 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	name = "Gearing up for war 2"
	desc = "The rising tensions and conflicts around the world are forcing us to increase our military spending and prepare our industries for another Great War. This inevitably means reduction of spending towards other important areas such as healthcare, education, infrastructure, and economic development - critical sectors responsible for our long-term economic growth and social well-being. High military spending can also lead to an increase in national debt, inflation, and gradual impoverishment of our populace. However, if we were to lose a major war or lose our sovereignty to foreign occupation, the consequences could be even more dire. And if we were to achieve victory, on the other hand, the benefits of victory against our rivals could completely outweigh our sacrifices and actually lead to an increase in long-term growth and prosperity. So let us invest in victory!"
	style = 2

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1914 }
	offset = 15
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = march year = 1963 }

	action = {
		name = ACTION_NAME_OK
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { local_flag = WAR2  } } type = belligerence value = 1 }
		
		command = { type = set_domestic which = defense_lobby value = 2 }
		
		command = { trigger = { atwar = yes }	type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 2 }
		command = { trigger = { atwar = no }	type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { atwar = no }	type = local_clrflag which = war_preparedness	 }
		
		command = { type = local_setflag which = WAR1  }
		command = { type = local_setflag which = WAR2  }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = WAR3  }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = WAR4  }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = WAR5  }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = WAR6  }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = WAR7  }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = WAR8  }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = WAR9  }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = WAR10 }
	}
}

		local_flag = AllInit
		policy = { type = defense_lobby value = 2 } 
		NOT = { policy = { type = defense_lobby value = 3 } }
		policy = { type = professional_army value = 1 }
		OR = {
			atwar = yes
			policy = { type = professional_army value = 6 } #3-yr Cons.
			AND = {
				continent = "North America"
				OR = {
					AND = {
						policy = { type = interventionism value = 4 } 
						OR = {
							#flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 3 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 4 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 4 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 4 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 4 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 1 }
						}
					}
					
					#Far away threats
					#flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 5 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 6 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 6 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 6 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 6 }
					
					#closer to home threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 3 }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				continent = "South America"
				OR = {
					AND = {
						policy = { type = interventionism value = 4 } 
						OR = {
							flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 3 }
							#flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 4 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 4 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 4 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 4 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 1 }
						}
					}
					
					#Far away threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 5 }
					#flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 6 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 6 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 6 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 6 }
					
					#closer to home threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 3 }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				continent = "Europe"
				OR = {
					AND = {
						policy = { type = interventionism value = 4 } 
						OR = {
							flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 3 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 4 }
							#flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 4 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 4 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 4 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 1 }
						}
					}
					
					#Far away threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 5 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 6 }
					#flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 6 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 6 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 6 }
					
					#closer to home threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 3 }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				OR = {
					continent = "Asia"
					continent = "Oceania"
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						policy = { type = interventionism value = 4 } 
						OR = {
							flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 3 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 4 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 4 }
							#flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 4 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 4 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 1 }
						}
					}
					
					#Far away threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 5 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 6 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 6 }
					#flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 6 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 6 }
					
					#closer to home threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 3 }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				continent = "Africa"
				OR = {
					AND = {
						policy = { type = interventionism value = 4 } 
						OR = {
							flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 3 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 4 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 4 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 4 }
							#flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 4 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 1 }
						}
					}
					
					#Far away threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 5 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 6 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 6 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 6 }
					#flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 6 }
					
					#closer to home threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 3 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	name = "Gearing up for war 3"
	desc = "The rising tensions and conflicts around the world are forcing us to increase our military spending and prepare our industries for another Great War. This inevitably means reduction of spending towards other important areas such as healthcare, education, infrastructure, and economic development - critical sectors responsible for our long-term economic growth and social well-being. High military spending can also lead to an increase in national debt, inflation, and gradual impoverishment of our populace. However, if we were to lose a major war or lose our sovereignty to foreign occupation, the consequences could be even more dire. And if we were to achieve victory, on the other hand, the benefits of victory against our rivals could completely outweigh our sacrifices and actually lead to an increase in long-term growth and prosperity. So let us invest in victory!"
	style = 2

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1914 }
	offset = 15
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = march year = 1963 }

	action = {
		name = ACTION_NAME_OK
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { local_flag = WAR2  } } type = belligerence value = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { local_flag = WAR3  } } type = belligerence value = 1 }
		
		command = { type = set_domestic which = defense_lobby value = 3 }
		
		command = { trigger = { atwar = yes }	type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 3 }
		command = { trigger = { atwar = no }	type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { atwar = no }	type = local_clrflag which = war_preparedness	 }
		
		command = { type = local_setflag which = WAR1  }
		command = { type = local_setflag which = WAR2  }
		command = { type = local_setflag which = WAR3  }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = WAR4  }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = WAR5  }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = WAR6  }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = WAR7  }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = WAR8  }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = WAR9  }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = WAR10 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 2004
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	TAG = { AFG ALB ALG ANG ARA ARG ARM AST AUS AZB BEL BEN BHU BLR BOL BOS BRA BRU BUL BUR CAL CAM CAN CGX CHC CHI CHL CMB COL CON COS CRO CSA CSX CUB CXB CYN CYP CZE DDR DEN DFR DOM EAF ECU EGY ENG EQA EST ETH EUS FIN FLA FRA GAB GEO GER GLD GRE GUA GUI GUY HAI HOL HON HUN ICL IDC IND INO IRE IRQ ISR ITA JAP JOR KAZ KOR KUR KYG LAO LAT LBY LEB LIB LIT LUX MAD MAL MAN MEN MEX MLY MON MOR MOZ MTN NAM NEP NIC NIG NOR NZL OMN OTT PAK PAL PAN PAR PER PHI POL POR PRI PRK PRU QUE RHO ROM RSI RUS SAF SAL SAR SAU SCA SCH SCO SER SIA SIB SIE SIK SLO SLV SOM SOV SPA SPR SUD SWE SYR TAJ TAN TEX TIB TRA TRK TUN TUR UKR URU USA UZB VEN VIE WLL YEM YUG U01 U02 U03 U04 U05 U06 U08 U09 U10 U11 U12 U13 U14 U15 U16 U17 U18 U19 U20 U21 U22 U23 U24 U25 U26 U27 U28 U29 U30 U31 U32 U33 U34 U35 U36 U39 U40 U41 U42 U43 U44 U45 U46 U47 U48 U49 U50 U51 U52 U53 U54 U55 U56 U57 U58 U59 U60 U61 U62 U63 U64 U65 U66 U67 U68 U69 U70 U71 U72 U73 U74 U75 U76 U77 U78 U79 U80 U81 U82 U83 U84 U85 U86 U87 U88 U89 U90 U91 U92 U93 U94 U95 U96 U97 U98 U99 USN UIC UTL UAU UPS UCH UBO UCS URO UER UGS UPE UTC }
	
	trigger = {
		flag = theatsAssessed
		local_flag = AllInit
		policy = { type = defense_lobby value = 3 } 
		NOT = { policy = { type = defense_lobby value = 4 } } 
		policy = { type = professional_army value = 2 }
		OR = {
			atwar = yes
			policy = { type = professional_army value = 7 } #Partial Mobilization
			AND = {
				continent = "North America"
				OR = {
					AND = {
						policy = { type = interventionism value = 5 } 
						OR = {
							#flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 4 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 5 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 5 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 5 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 5 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 2 }
						}
					}
					
					#Far away threats
					#flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 6 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 7 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 7 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 7 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 7 }
					
					#closer to home threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 4 }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				continent = "South America"
				OR = {
					AND = {
						policy = { type = interventionism value = 5 } 
						OR = {
							flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 4 }
							#flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 5 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 5 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 5 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 5 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 2 }
						}
					}
					
					#Far away threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 6 }
					#flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 7 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 7 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 7 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 7 }

		command = { trigger = { NOT = { local_flag = WAR4  } } type = belligerence value = 1 }
		
		command = { type = set_domestic which = defense_lobby value = 4 }
		
		command = { trigger = { atwar = yes }	type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 4 }
		command = { trigger = { atwar = no }	type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 1 }

		command = { type = local_setflag which = WAR4  }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = WAR5  }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = WAR6  }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = WAR7  }

High military spending can also lead to an increase in national debt, inflation, and gradual impoverishment of our populace. However, if we were to lose a major war or lose our sovereignty to foreign occupation, the consequences could be even more dire. And if we were to achieve victory, on the other hand, the benefits of victory against our rivals could completely outweigh our sacrifices and actually lead to an increase in long-term growth and prosperity. So let us invest in victory!"
	style = 2

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1914 }
	offset = 15
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = march year = 1963 }

	action = {
		name = ACTION_NAME_OK
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { local_flag = WAR2  } } type = belligerence value = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { local_flag = WAR3  } } type = belligerence value = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { local_flag = WAR4  } } type = belligerence value = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { local_flag = WAR5  } } type = belligerence value = 1 }
		
		command = { type = set_domestic which = defense_lobby value = 5 }
		
		command = { trigger = { atwar = yes }	type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 5 }
		command = { trigger = { atwar = no }	type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { atwar = no }	type = local_clrflag which = war_preparedness	 }
		
		command = { type = local_setflag which = WAR1  }
		command = { type = local_setflag which = WAR2  }
		command = { type = local_setflag which = WAR3  }
		command = { type = local_setflag which = WAR4  }
		command = { type = local_setflag which = WAR5  }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = WAR6  }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = WAR7  }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = WAR8  }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = WAR9  }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = WAR10 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 2006
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	TAG = { AFG ALB ALG ANG ARA ARG ARM AST AUS AZB BEL BEN BHU BLR BOL BOS BRA BRU BUL BUR CAL CAM CAN CGX CHC CHI CHL CMB COL CON COS CRO CSA CSX CUB CXB CYN CYP CZE DDR DEN DFR DOM EAF ECU EGY ENG EQA EST ETH EUS FIN FLA FRA GAB GEO GER GLD GRE GUA GUI GUY HAI HOL HON HUN ICL IDC IND INO IRE IRQ ISR ITA JAP JOR KAZ KOR KUR KYG LAO LAT LBY LEB LIB LIT LUX MAD MAL MAN MEN MEX MLY MON MOR MOZ MTN NAM NEP NIC NIG NOR NZL OMN OTT PAK PAL PAN PAR PER PHI POL POR PRI PRK PRU QUE RHO ROM RSI RUS SAF SAL SAR SAU SCA SCH SCO SER SIA SIB SIE SIK SLO SLV SOM SOV SPA SPR SUD SWE SYR TAJ TAN TEX TIB TRA TRK TUN TUR UKR URU USA UZB VEN VIE WLL YEM YUG U01 U02 U03 U04 U05 U06 U08 U09 U10 U11 U12 U13 U14 U15 U16 U17 U18 U19 U20 U21 U22 U23 U24 U25 U26 U27 U28 U29 U30 U31 U32 U33 U34 U35 U36 U39 U40 U41 U42 U43 U44 U45 U46 U47 U48 U49 U50 U51 U52 U53 U54 U55 U56 U57 U58 U59 U60 U61 U62 U63 U64 U65 U66 U67 U68 U69 U70 U71 U72 U73 U74 U75 U76 U77 U78 U79 U80 U81 U82 U83 U84 U85 U86 U87 U88 U89 U90 U91 U92 U93 U94 U95 U96 U97 U98 U99 USN UIC UTL UAU UPS UCH UBO UCS URO UER UGS UPE UTC }
	
	trigger = {
		flag = theatsAssessed
		local_flag = AllInit
		policy = { type = defense_lobby value = 5 } 
		NOT = { policy = { type = defense_lobby value = 6 } } 
		policy = { type = professional_army value = 3 }
		OR = {
			policy = { type = professional_army value = 8 } #General mobilization
			AND = {
				lost_national = { value = 3 } #Invaded
				NOT = { lost_national = { value = 100 } } #Colony
			}
			lost_IC = { value = 3 } #Invaded
			local_flag = inMajorWar
			AND = {
				continent = "North America"
				OR = {
					AND = {
						policy = { type = interventionism value = 7 } 
						OR = {
							#flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 6 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 7 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 7 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 7 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 7 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 4 }
						}
					}
					
					#Far away threats
					#flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 8 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 9 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 9 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 9 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 9 }
					
					#closer to home threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 6 }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				continent = "South America"
				OR = {
					AND = {
						policy = { type = interventionism value = 7 } 
						OR = {
							flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 6 }
							#flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 7 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 7 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 7 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 7 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 4 }
						}
					}
					
					#Far away threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 8 }
					#flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 9 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 9 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 9 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 9 }
					
					#closer to home threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 6 }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				continent = "Europe"
				OR = {
					AND = {
						policy = { type = interventionism value = 7 } 
						OR = {
							flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 6 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 7 }
							#flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 7 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 7 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 7 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 4 }
						}
					}
					
					#Far away threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 8 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 9 }
					#flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 9 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 9 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 9 }
					
					#closer to home threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 6 }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				OR = {
					continent = "Asia"
					continent = "Oceania"
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						policy = { type = interventionism value = 7 } 
						OR = {
							flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 6 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 7 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 7 }
							#flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 7 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 7 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 4 }
						}
					}
					
					#Far away threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 8 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 9 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 9 }
					#flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 9 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 9 }
					
					#closer to home threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 6 }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				continent = "Africa"
				OR = {
					AND = {
						policy = { type = interventionism value = 7 } 
						OR = {
							flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 5 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 7 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 7 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 7 }
							#flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 7 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 4 }
						}
					}
					
					#Far away threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 8 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 9 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 9 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 9 }
					#flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 9 }
					
					#closer to home threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 6 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	name = "Gearing up for war 6"
	desc = "The rising tensions and conflicts around the world are forcing us to increase our military spending and prepare our industries for another Great War. This inevitably means reduction of spending towards other important areas such as healthcare, education, infrastructure, and economic development - critical sectors responsible for our long-term economic growth and social well-being. High military spending can also lead to an increase in national debt, inflation, and gradual impoverishment of our populace. However, if we were to lose a major war or lose our sovereignty to foreign occupation, the consequences could be even more dire. And if we were to achieve victory, on the other hand, the benefits of victory against our rivals could completely outweigh our sacrifices and actually lead to an increase in long-term growth and prosperity. So let us invest in victory!"
	style = 2

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1914 }
	offset = 15
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = march year = 1963 }

	action = {
		name = ACTION_NAME_OK
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { local_flag = WAR2  } } type = belligerence value = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { local_flag = WAR3  } } type = belligerence value = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { local_flag = WAR4  } } type = belligerence value = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { local_flag = WAR5  } } type = belligerence value = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { local_flag = WAR6  } } type = belligerence value = 1 }
		
		command = { type = set_domestic which = defense_lobby value = 6 }
		
		command = { trigger = { atwar = yes }	type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 6 }
		command = { trigger = { atwar = no }	type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { atwar = no }	type = local_clrflag which = war_preparedness	 }
		
		command = { type = local_setflag which = WAR1  }
		command = { type = local_setflag which = WAR2  }
		command = { type = local_setflag which = WAR3  }
		command = { type = local_setflag which = WAR4  }
		command = { type = local_setflag which = WAR5  }
		command = { type = local_setflag which = WAR6  }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = WAR7  }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = WAR8  }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = WAR9  }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = WAR10 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 2007
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	TAG = { AFG ALB ALG ANG ARA ARG ARM AST AUS AZB BEL BEN BHU BLR BOL BOS BRA BRU BUL BUR CAL CAM CAN CGX CHC CHI CHL CMB COL CON COS CRO CSA CSX CUB CXB CYN CYP CZE DDR DEN DFR DOM EAF ECU EGY ENG EQA EST ETH EUS FIN FLA FRA GAB GEO GER GLD GRE GUA GUI GUY HAI HOL HON HUN ICL IDC IND INO IRE IRQ ISR ITA JAP JOR KAZ KOR KUR KYG LAO LAT LBY LEB LIB LIT LUX MAD MAL MAN MEN MEX MLY MON MOR MOZ MTN NAM NEP NIC NIG NOR NZL OMN OTT PAK PAL PAN PAR PER PHI POL POR PRI PRK PRU QUE RHO ROM RSI RUS SAF SAL SAR SAU SCA SCH SCO SER SIA SIB SIE SIK SLO SLV SOM SOV SPA SPR SUD SWE SYR TAJ TAN TEX TIB TRA TRK TUN TUR UKR URU USA UZB VEN VIE WLL YEM YUG U01 U02 U03 U04 U05 U06 U08 U09 U10 U11 U12 U13 U14 U15 U16 U17 U18 U19 U20 U21 U22 U23 U24 U25 U26 U27 U28 U29 U30 U31 U32 U33 U34 U35 U36 U39 U40 U41 U42 U43 U44 U45 U46 U47 U48 U49 U50 U51 U52 U53 U54 U55 U56 U57 U58 U59 U60 U61 U62 U63 U64 U65 U66 U67 U68 U69 U70 U71 U72 U73 U74 U75 U76 U77 U78 U79 U80 U81 U82 U83 U84 U85 U86 U87 U88 U89 U90 U91 U92 U93 U94 U95 U96 U97 U98 U99 USN UIC UTL UAU UPS UCH UBO UCS URO UER UGS UPE UTC }
	
	trigger = {
		flag = theatsAssessed
		local_flag = AllInit
		policy = { type = defense_lobby value = 6 } 
		NOT = { policy = { type = defense_lobby value = 7 } } 
		policy = { type = professional_army value = 3 }
		OR = {
			policy = { type = professional_army value = 9 } #Extended mobilization
			AND = {
				lost_national = { value = 10 } #Invaded
				NOT = { lost_national = { value = 100 } } #Colony
			}
			lost_IC = { value = 5 } #Invaded
			local_flag = inMajorWar
			AND = {
				continent = "North America"
				OR = {
					AND = {
						policy = { type = interventionism value = 9 }
						OR = {
							#flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 7 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 8 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 8 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 8 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 8 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 5 }
						}
					}
					
					#Far away threats
					#flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 9 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 10 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 10 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 10 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 10 }
					
					#closer to home threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 7 }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				continent = "South America"
				OR = {
					AND = {
						policy = { type = interventionism value = 9 } 
						OR = {
							flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 7 }
							#flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 8 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 8 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 8 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 8 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 5 }
						}
					}
					
					#Far away threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 9 }
					#flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 10 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 10 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 10 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 10 }
					
					#closer to home threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 7 }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				continent = "Europe"
				OR = {
					AND = {
						policy = { type = interventionism value = 9 } 
						OR = {
							flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 7 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 8 }
							#flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 8 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 8 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 8 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 5 }
						}
					}
					
					#Far away threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 9 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 10 }
					#flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 10 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 10 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 10 }
					
					#closer to home threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 7 }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				OR = {
					continent = "Asia"
					continent = "Oceania"
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						policy = { type = interventionism value = 9 } 
						OR = {
							flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 7 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 8 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 8 }
							#flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 8 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 8 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 5 }
						}
					}
					
					#Far away threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 9 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 10 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 10 }
					#flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 10 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 10 }
					
					#closer to home threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 7 }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				continent = "Africa"
				OR = {
					AND = {
						policy = { type = interventionism value = 9 } 
						OR = {
							flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 7 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 8 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 8 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 8 }
							#flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 8 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 5 }
						}
					}
					
					#Far away threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 9 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 10 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 10 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 10 }
					#flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 10 }
					
					#closer to home threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 7 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	name = "Gearing up for war 7"
	desc = "The rising tensions and conflicts around the world are forcing us to increase our military spending and prepare our industries for another Great War. This inevitably means reduction of spending towards other important areas such as healthcare, education, infrastructure, and economic development - critical sectors responsible for our long-term economic growth and social well-being. And if we were to achieve victory, on the other hand, the benefits of victory against our rivals could completely outweigh our sacrifices and actually lead to an increase in long-term growth and prosperity. So let us invest in victory!"

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1914 }
	offset = 15
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = march year = 1963 }

	action = {
		name = ACTION_NAME_OK
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { local_flag = WAR2  } } type = belligerence value = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { local_flag = WAR3  } } type = belligerence value = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { local_flag = WAR4  } } type = belligerence value = 1 }

event = {
	id = 2008
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	TAG = { AFG ALB ALG ANG ARA ARG ARM AST AUS AZB BEL BEN BHU BLR BOL BOS BRA BRU BUL BUR CAL CAM CAN CGX CHC CHI CHL CMB COL CON COS CRO CSA CSX CUB CXB CYN CYP CZE DDR DEN DFR DOM EAF ECU EGY ENG EQA EST ETH EUS FIN FLA FRA GAB GEO GER GLD GRE GUA GUI GUY HAI HOL HON HUN ICL IDC IND INO IRE IRQ ISR ITA JAP JOR KAZ KOR KUR KYG LAO LAT LBY LEB LIB LIT LUX MAD MAL MAN MEN MEX MLY MON MOR MOZ MTN NAM NEP NIC NIG NOR NZL OMN OTT PAK PAL PAN PAR PER PHI POL POR PRI PRK PRU QUE RHO ROM RSI RUS SAF SAL SAR SAU SCA SCH SCO SER SIA SIB SIE SIK SLO SLV SOM SOV SPA SPR SUD SWE SYR TAJ TAN TEX TIB TRA TRK TUN TUR UKR URU USA UZB VEN VIE WLL YEM YUG U01 U02 U03 U04 U05 U06 U08 U09 U10 U11 U12 U13 U14 U15 U16 U17 U18 U19 U20 U21 U22 U23 U24 U25 U26 U27 U28 U29 U30 U31 U32 U33 U34 U35 U36 U39 U40 U41 U42 U43 U44 U45 U46 U47 U48 U49 U50 U51 U52 U53 U54 U55 U56 U57 U58 U59 U60 U61 U62 U63 U64 U65 U66 U67 U68 U69 U70 U71 U72 U73 U74 U75 U76 U77 U78 U79 U80 U81 U82 U83 U84 U85 U86 U87 U88 U89 U90 U91 U92 U93 U94 U95 U96 U97 U98 U99 USN UIC UTL UAU UPS UCH UBO UCS URO UER UGS UPE UTC }
	
	trigger = {
		flag = theatsAssessed
		local_flag = AllInit
		policy = { type = defense_lobby value = 7 } 
		NOT = { policy = { type = defense_lobby value = 8 } } 
		policy = { type = professional_army value = 4 }
		OR = {
			policy = { type = professional_army value = 10 } #Total mobilization
			policy = { type = interventionism value = 10 } 
			AND = {
				lost_national = { value = 20 } #Invaded
				NOT = { lost_national = { value = 100 } } #Colony
			}
			lost_IC = { value = 15 } #Invaded
			local_flag = inMajorWar
		}
	}
	
	name = "Gearing up for war 8"
	desc = "Our country is facing an existential threat of foreign invasion - the investment in all other areas crucial to economic development can be postponed. For now, we must mobilize the resources at our disposal in order to win the war!"
	style = 2

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1914 }
	offset = 15
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = march year = 1963 }

	action = {
		name = ACTION_NAME_OK
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { local_flag = WAR2  } } type = belligerence value = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { local_flag = WAR3  } } type = belligerence value = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { local_flag = WAR4  } } type = belligerence value = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { local_flag = WAR5  } } type = belligerence value = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { local_flag = WAR6  } } type = belligerence value = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { local_flag = WAR7  } } type = belligerence value = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { local_flag = WAR8  } } type = belligerence value = 1 }
		
		command = { type = set_domestic which = defense_lobby value = 8 }
		
		command = { trigger = { atwar = yes }	type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 8 }
		command = { trigger = { atwar = no }	type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { atwar = no }	type = local_clrflag which = war_preparedness	 }
		
		command = { type = local_setflag which = WAR1  }
		command = { type = local_setflag which = WAR2  }
		command = { type = local_setflag which = WAR3  }
		command = { type = local_setflag which = WAR4  }

				lost_national = { value = 40 } #Facing imminent defeat

	persistent = yes
	TAG = { AFG ALB ALG ANG ARA ARG ARM AST AUS AZB BEL BEN BHU BLR BOL BOS BRA BRU BUL BUR CAL CAM CAN CGX CHC CHI CHL CMB COL CON COS CRO CSA CSX CUB CXB CYN CYP CZE DDR DEN DFR DOM EAF ECU EGY ENG EQA EST ETH EUS FIN FLA FRA GAB GEO GER GLD GRE GUA GUI GUY HAI HOL HON HUN ICL IDC IND INO IRE IRQ ISR ITA JAP JOR KAZ KOR KUR KYG LAO LAT LBY LEB LIB LIT LUX MAD MAL MAN MEN MEX MLY MON MOR MOZ MTN NAM NEP NIC NIG NOR NZL OMN OTT PAK PAL PAN PAR PER PHI POL POR PRI PRK PRU QUE RHO ROM RSI RUS SAF SAL SAR SAU SCA SCH SCO SER SIA SIB SIE SIK SLO SLV SOM SOV SPA SPR SUD SWE SYR TAJ TAN TEX TIB TRA TRK TUN TUR UKR URU USA UZB VEN VIE WLL YEM YUG U01 U02 U03 U04 U05 U06 U08 U09 U10 U11 U12 U13 U14 U15 U16 U17 U18 U19 U20 U21 U22 U23 U24 U25 U26 U27 U28 U29 U30 U31 U32 U33 U34 U35 U36 U39 U40 U41 U42 U43 U44 U45 U46 U47 U48 U49 U50 U51 U52 U53 U54 U55 U56 U57 U58 U59 U60 U61 U62 U63 U64 U65 U66 U67 U68 U69 U70 U71 U72 U73 U74 U75 U76 U77 U78 U79 U80 U81 U82 U83 U84 U85 U86 U87 U88 U89 U90 U91 U92 U93 U94 U95 U96 U97 U98 U99 USN UIC UTL UAU UPS UCH UBO UCS URO UER UGS UPE UTC }
	
	trigger = {
		flag = theatsAssessed
		local_flag = AllInit

		NOT = { policy = { type = defense_lobby value = 3 } } 
		NOT = {
			atwar = yes
			policy = { type = professional_army value = 5 } #2-yr Cons.
			AND = {
				continent = "North America"
				OR = {
					policy = { type = interventionism value = 3 } 
					
					#Far away threats
					#flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 3 }

					flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 4 }

				}
			}
			AND = {
				continent = "South America"
				OR = {
					policy = { type = interventionism value = 3 } 
					
					#Far away threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 3 }
					#flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 4 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 4 }

					#closer to home threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 1 }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				continent = "Europe"
				OR = {
					policy = { type = interventionism value = 3 } 
					
					#Far away threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 3 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 4 }
					#flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 4 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 4 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 4 }
					
					#closer to home threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 1 }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				OR = {
					continent = "Asia"
					continent = "Oceania"
				}
				OR = {
					policy = { type = interventionism value = 3 } 
					
					#Far away threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 3 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 4 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 4 }
					#flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 4 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 4 }
					
					#closer to home threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 1 }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				continent = "Africa"
				OR = {
					policy = { type = interventionism value = 3 }

					flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 4 }

					#closer to home threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 1 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	name = "Restoring peacetime economy 1"
	desc = "The tensions and wars around the world have subsided somewhat. 		command = { trigger = { local_flag = WAR9  } type = belligerence value = -1 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = WAR10 } type = belligerence value = -1 }
		
		command = { type = set_domestic which = defense_lobby value = 1 }
		
		command = { trigger = { atwar = yes }	type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 2 }
		command = { trigger = { atwar = no }	type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { atwar = no }	type = local_clrflag which = war_preparedness	 }

Our lawmakers, bureaucrats, state and party officials are concerned that the high level of military spending is unwarranted and is causing our economy to strain and stagnate when compared to our rivals - we must reduce our military spending immediately."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1914 }
	offset = 15
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = march year = 1963 }

	action = {
		name = ACTION_NAME_OK
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = WAR3  } type = belligerence value = -1 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = WAR4  } type = belligerence value = -1 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = WAR5  } type = belligerence value = -1 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = WAR6  } type = belligerence value = -1 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = WAR7  } type = belligerence value = -1 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = WAR8  } type = belligerence value = -1 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = WAR9  } type = belligerence value = -1 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = WAR10 } type = belligerence value = -1 }
		
		command = { type = set_domestic which = defense_lobby value = 2 }
		
		command = { trigger = { atwar = yes }	type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 2 }
		command = { trigger = { atwar = no }	type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { atwar = no }	type = local_clrflag which = war_preparedness	 }
		
		command = { type = local_setflag which = WAR1  }
		command = { type = local_setflag which = WAR2  }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = WAR3  }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = WAR4  }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = WAR5  }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = WAR6  }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = WAR7  }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = WAR8  }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = WAR9  }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = WAR10 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 2013
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	TAG = { AFG ALB ALG ANG ARA ARG ARM AST AUS AZB BEL BEN BHU BLR BOL BOS BRA BRU BUL BUR CAL CAM CAN CGX CHC CHI CHL CMB COL CON COS CRO CSA CSX CUB CXB CYN CYP CZE DDR DEN DFR DOM EAF ECU EGY ENG EQA EST ETH EUS FIN FLA FRA GAB GEO GER GLD GRE GUA GUI GUY HAI HOL HON HUN ICL IDC IND INO IRE IRQ ISR ITA JAP JOR KAZ KOR KUR KYG LAO LAT LBY LEB LIB LIT LUX MAD MAL MAN MEN MEX MLY MON MOR MOZ MTN NAM NEP NIC NIG NOR NZL OMN OTT PAK PAL PAN PAR PER PHI POL POR PRI PRK PRU QUE RHO ROM RSI RUS SAF SAL SAR SAU SCA SCH SCO SER SIA SIB SIE SIK SLO SLV SOM SOV SPA SPR SUD SWE SYR TAJ TAN TEX TIB TRA TRK TUN TUR UKR URU USA UZB VEN VIE WLL YEM YUG U01 U02 U03 U04 U05 U06 U08 U09 U10 U11 U12 U13 U14 U15 U16 U17 U18 U19 U20 U21 U22 U23 U24 U25 U26 U27 U28 U29 U30 U31 U32 U33 U34 U35 U36 U39 U40 U41 U42 U43 U44 U45 U46 U47 U48 U49 U50 U51 U52 U53 U54 U55 U56 U57 U58 U59 U60 U61 U62 U63 U64 U65 U66 U67 U68 U69 U70 U71 U72 U73 U74 U75 U76 U77 U78 U79 U80 U81 U82 U83 U84 U85 U86 U87 U88 U89 U90 U91 U92 U93 U94 U95 U96 U97 U98 U99 USN UIC UTL UAU UPS UCH UBO UCS URO UER UGS UPE UTC }
	
	trigger = {
		flag = theatsAssessed
		local_flag = AllInit
		policy = { type = defense_lobby value = 4 } 
		NOT = { policy = { type = defense_lobby value = 5 } } 
		NOT = {
			atwar = yes
			policy = { type = professional_army value = 7 } #Partial mobilization
			AND = {
				continent = "North America"
				OR = {
					AND = {
						policy = { type = interventionism value = 5 } 
						OR = {
							#flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 3 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 4 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 4 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 4 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 4 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 1 }
						}
					}
					
					#Far away threats
					#flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 5 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 6 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 6 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 6 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 6 }
					
					#closer to home threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 3 }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				continent = "South America"
				OR = {
					AND = {
						policy = { type = interventionism value = 5 } 
						OR = {
							flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 3 }
							#flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 4 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 4 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 4 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 4 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 1 }
						}
					}
					
					#Far away threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 5 }
					#flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 6 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 6 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 6 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 6 }
					
					#closer to home threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 3 }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				continent = "Europe"
				OR = {
					AND = {
						policy = { type = interventionism value = 5 } 
						OR = {
							flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 3 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 4 }
							#flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 4 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 4 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 4 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 1 }
						}
					}
					
					#Far away threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 5 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 6 }
					#flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 6 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 6 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 6 }
					
					#closer to home threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 3 }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				OR = {
					continent = "Asia"
					continent = "Oceania"
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						policy = { type = interventionism value = 5 } 
						OR = {
							flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 3 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 4 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 4 }
							#flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 4 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 4 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 1 }
						}
					}
					
					#Far away threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 5 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 6 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 6 }
					#flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 6 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 6 }
					
					#closer to home threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 3 }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				continent = "Africa"
				OR = {
					AND = {
						policy = { type = interventionism value = 5 } 
						OR = {
							flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 3 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 4 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 4 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 4 }
							#flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 4 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 1 }
						}
					}
					
					#Far away threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 5 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 6 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 6 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 6 }
					#flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 6 }
					
					#closer to home threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 3 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	name = "Restoring peacetime economy 3"
	desc = "The tensions and wars around the world have subsided somewhat. Our lawmakers, bureaucrats, state and party officials are concerned that the high level of military spending is unwarranted and is causing our economy to strain and stagnate when compared to our rivals - we must reduce our military spending immediately."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1914 }
	offset = 15
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = march year = 1963 }

	action = {
		name = ACTION_NAME_OK
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = WAR4  } type = belligerence value = -1 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = WAR5  } type = belligerence value = -1 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = WAR6  } type = belligerence value = -1 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = WAR7  } type = belligerence value = -1 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = WAR8  } type = belligerence value = -1 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = WAR9  } type = belligerence value = -1 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = WAR10 } type = belligerence value = -1 }
		
		command = { type = set_domestic which = defense_lobby value = 3 }
		
		command = { trigger = { atwar = yes }	type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 3 }
		command = { trigger = { atwar = no }	type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { atwar = no }	type = local_clrflag which = war_preparedness	 }
		
		command = { type = local_setflag which = WAR1  }

		command = { type = local_setflag which = WAR3  }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = WAR4  }

event = {
	id = 2015
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	TAG = { AFG ALB ALG ANG ARA ARG ARM AST AUS AZB BEL BEN BHU BLR BOL BOS BRA BRU BUL BUR CAL CAM CAN CGX CHC CHI CHL CMB COL CON COS CRO CSA CSX CUB CXB CYN CYP CZE DDR DEN DFR DOM EAF ECU EGY ENG EQA EST ETH EUS FIN FLA FRA GAB GEO GER GLD GRE GUA GUI GUY HAI HOL HON HUN ICL IDC IND INO IRE IRQ ISR ITA JAP JOR KAZ KOR KUR KYG LAO LAT LBY LEB LIB LIT LUX MAD MAL MAN MEN MEX MLY MON MOR MOZ MTN NAM NEP NIC NIG NOR NZL OMN OTT PAK PAL PAN PAR PER PHI POL POR PRI PRK PRU QUE RHO ROM RSI RUS SAF SAL SAR SAU SCA SCH SCO SER SIA SIB SIE SIK SLO SLV SOM SOV SPA SPR SUD SWE SYR TAJ TAN TEX TIB TRA TRK TUN TUR UKR URU USA UZB VEN VIE WLL YEM YUG U01 U02 U03 U04 U05 U06 U08 U09 U10 U11 U12 U13 U14 U15 U16 U17 U18 U19 U20 U21 U22 U23 U24 U25 U26 U27 U28 U29 U30 U31 U32 U33 U34 U35 U36 U39 U40 U41 U42 U43 U44 U45 U46 U47 U48 U49 U50 U51 U52 U53 U54 U55 U56 U57 U58 U59 U60 U61 U62 U63 U64 U65 U66 U67 U68 U69 U70 U71 U72 U73 U74 U75 U76 U77 U78 U79 U80 U81 U82 U83 U84 U85 U86 U87 U88 U89 U90 U91 U92 U93 U94 U95 U96 U97 U98 U99 USN UIC UTL UAU UPS UCH UBO UCS URO UER UGS UPE UTC }
	
	trigger = {
		flag = theatsAssessed
		local_flag = AllInit
		policy = { type = defense_lobby value = 6 } 
		NOT = { policy = { type = defense_lobby value = 7 } } 
		NOT = {
			policy = { type = professional_army value = 8 } #General mobilization
			lost_national = { value = 1 } #Invaded
			local_flag = inMajorWar
			AND = {
				continent = "North America"
				OR = {
					AND = {
						policy = { type = interventionism value = 7 } 
						OR = {
							#flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 5 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 6 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 6 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 6 }

							flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 3 }
						}
					}
					
					#Far away threats
					#flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 7 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 8 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 8 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 8 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 8 }
					
					#closer to home threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 5 }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				continent = "South America"
				OR = {
					AND = {
						policy = { type = interventionism value = 7 } 
						OR = {
							flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 5 }
							#flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 6 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 6 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 6 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 6 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 3 }
						}
					}
					
					#Far away threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 7 }
					#flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 8 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 8 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 8 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 8 }
					
					#closer to home threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 5 }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				continent = "Europe"
				OR = {
					AND = {
						policy = { type = interventionism value = 7 } 
						OR = {
							flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 5 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 6 }
							#flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 6 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 6 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 6 }
							flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 3 }
						}
					}
					
					#Far away threats
					flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 7 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 8 }
					#flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 8 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 8 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 8 }

			}
			AND = {

					continent = "Asia"
					continent = "Oceania"
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						policy = { type = interventionism value = 7 } 
						OR = {
							flag = { which = Threat_level_NA when = 1 value = 5 }

							flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 6 }

						}
					}

					flag = { which = Threat_level_SA when = 1 value = 8 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_EU when = 1 value = 8 }
					#flag = { which = Threat_level_AP when = 1 value = 8 }
					flag = { which = Threat_level_AF when = 1 value = 8 }

				}
			}
			AND = {
				continent = "Africa"
				OR = {
					AND = {

						OR = {

				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	name = "Restoring peacetime economy 5"
	desc = "The tensions and wars around the world have subsided somewhat. Our lawmakers, bureaucrats, state and party officials are concerned that the high level of military spending is unwarranted and is causing our economy to strain and stagnate when compared to our rivals - we must reduce our military spending immediately."

		command = { trigger = { local_flag = WAR10 } type = belligerence value = -1 }

		command = { trigger = { atwar = no }	type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { atwar = no }	type = local_clrflag which = war_preparedness	 }

	id = 2016
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	TAG = { AFG ALB ALG ANG ARA ARG ARM AST AUS AZB BEL BEN BHU BLR BOL BOS BRA BRU BUL BUR CAL CAM CAN CGX CHC CHI CHL CMB COL CON COS CRO CSA CSX CUB CXB CYN CYP CZE DDR DEN DFR DOM EAF ECU EGY ENG EQA EST ETH EUS FIN FLA FRA GAB GEO GER GLD GRE GUA GUI GUY HAI HOL HON HUN ICL IDC IND INO IRE IRQ ISR ITA JAP JOR KAZ KOR KUR KYG LAO LAT LBY LEB LIB LIT LUX MAD MAL MAN MEN MEX MLY MON MOR MOZ MTN NAM NEP NIC NIG NOR NZL OMN OTT PAK PAL PAN PAR PER PHI POL POR PRI PRK PRU QUE RHO ROM RSI RUS SAF SAL SAR SAU SCA SCH SCO SER SIA SIB SIE SIK SLO SLV SOM SOV SPA SPR SUD SWE SYR TAJ TAN TEX TIB TRA TRK TUN TUR UKR URU USA UZB VEN VIE WLL YEM YUG U01 U02 U03 U04 U05 U06 U08 U09 U10 U11 U12 U13 U14 U15 U16 U17 U18 U19 U20 U21 U22 U23 U24 U25 U26 U27 U28 U29 U30 U31 U32 U33 U34 U35 U36 U39 U40 U41 U42 U43 U44 U45 U46 U47 U48 U49 U50 U51 U52 U53 U54 U55 U56 U57 U58 U59 U60 U61 U62 U63 U64 U65 U66 U67 U68 U69 U70 U71 U72 U73 U74 U75 U76 U77 U78 U79 U80 U81 U82 U83 U84 U85 U86 U87 U88 U89 U90 U91 U92 U93 U94 U95 U96 U97 U98 U99 USN UIC UTL UAU UPS UCH UBO UCS URO UER UGS UPE UTC }

		local_flag = AllInit

		NOT = { policy = { type = defense_lobby value = 8 } }

			policy = { type = professional_army value = 9 } #Extended mobilization
			lost_national	= { value = 1 } #Invaded
			lost_IC 		= { value = 1 } #Invaded
			local_flag = inMajorWar
			AND = {
				continent = "North America"
				OR = {
					AND = {
						policy = { type = interventionism value = 9 }
