		command = { type = local_setflag which = WAR5  }
		command = { type = local_setflag which = WAR6  }
		command = { type = local_setflag which = WAR7  }
		command = { type = local_setflag which = WAR8  }
		command = { type = local_setflag which = WAR9  }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = WAR10 }
	}
}



#Economic growth event

event = {
	id = 3000
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	#Probably no need to have it pop up as a notification for everyone
	#TAG = { AFG ALB ALG ANG ARA ARG ARM AST AUS AZB BEL BEN BHU BLR BOL BOS BRA BRU BUL BUR CAL CAM CAN CGX CHC CHI CHL CMB COL CON COS CRO CSA CSX CUB CXB CYN CYP CZE DDR DEN DFR DOM EAF ECU EGY ENG EQA EST ETH EUS FIN FLA FRA GAB GEO GER GLD GRE GUA GUI GUY HAI HOL HON HUN ICL IDC IND INO IRE IRQ ISR ITA JAP JOR KAZ KOR KUR KYG LAO LAT LBY LEB LIB LIT LUX MAD MAL MAN MEN MEX MLY MON MOR MOZ MTN NAM NEP NIC NIG NOR NZL OMN OTT PAK PAL PAN PAR PER PHI POL POR PRI PRK PRU QUE RHO ROM RSI RUS SAF SAL SAR SAU SCA SCH SCO SER SIA SIB SIE SIK SLO SLV SOM SOV SPA SPR SUD SWE SYR TAJ TAN TEX TIB TRA TRK TUN TUR UKR URU USA UZB VEN VIE WLL YEM YUG U01 U02 U03 U04 U05 U06 U08 U09 U10 U11 U12 U13 U14 U15 U16 U17 U18 U19 U20 U21 U22 U23 U24 U25 U26 U27 U28 U29 U30 U31 U32 U33 U34 U35 U36 U39 U40 U41 U42 U43 U44 U45 U46 U47 U48 U49 U50 U51 U52 U53 U54 U55 U56 U57 U58 U59 U60 U61 U62 U63 U64 U65 U66 U67 U68 U69 U70 U71 U72 U73 U74 U75 U76 U77 U78 U79 U80 U81 U82 U83 U84 U85 U86 U87 U88 U89 U90 U91 U92 U93 U94 U95 U96 U97 U98 U99 USN UIC UTL UAU UPS UCH UBO UCS URO UER UGS UPE UTC }
	
	trigger = {
		local_flag = AllInit
		month = 11
		OR = {
			AND = {
				year = 1936
				NOT = { local_flag = { which = EconomicGrowth when = 1 value = 1936 } }
			}
			AND = {
				year = 1937
				NOT = { local_flag = { which = EconomicGrowth when = 1 value = 1937 } }
			}
			AND = {
				year = 1938
				NOT = { local_flag = { which = EconomicGrowth when = 1 value = 1938 } }
			}
			AND = {
				year = 1939
				NOT = { local_flag = { which = EconomicGrowth when = 1 value = 1939 } }
			}
			AND = {
				year = 1940
				NOT = { local_flag = { which = EconomicGrowth when = 1 value = 1940 } }
			}
			AND = {
				year = 1941
				NOT = { local_flag = { which = EconomicGrowth when = 1 value = 1941 } }
			}
			AND = {
				year = 1942
				NOT = { local_flag = { which = EconomicGrowth when = 1 value = 1942 } }
			}
			AND = {
				year = 1943
				NOT = { local_flag = { which = EconomicGrowth when = 1 value = 1943 } }
			}
			AND = {
				year = 1944
				NOT = { local_flag = { which = EconomicGrowth when = 1 value = 1944 } }
			}
			AND = {
				year = 1945
				NOT = { local_flag = { which = EconomicGrowth when = 1 value = 1945 } }
			}
			AND = {
				year = 1946
				NOT = { local_flag = { which = EconomicGrowth when = 1 value = 1946 } }
			}
			AND = {
				year = 1947
				NOT = { local_flag = { which = EconomicGrowth when = 1 value = 1947 } }
			}
			AND = {
				year = 1948
				NOT = { local_flag = { which = EconomicGrowth when = 1 value = 1948 } }
			}
			AND = {
				year = 1949
				NOT = { local_flag = { which = EconomicGrowth when = 1 value = 1949 } }
			}
			AND = {
				year = 1950
				NOT = { local_flag = { which = EconomicGrowth when = 1 value = 1950 } }
			}
			AND = {
				year = 1951
				NOT = { local_flag = { which = EconomicGrowth when = 1 value = 1951 } }
			}
			AND = {
				year = 1952
				NOT = { local_flag = { which = EconomicGrowth when = 1 value = 1952 } }
			}
			AND = {
				year = 1953
				NOT = { local_flag = { which = EconomicGrowth when = 1 value = 1953 } }
			}
			AND = {
				year = 1954
				NOT = { local_flag = { which = EconomicGrowth when = 1 value = 1954 } }
			}
			AND = {
				year = 1955
				NOT = { local_flag = { which = EconomicGrowth when = 1 value = 1955 } }
			}
		}
	}
	
	name = "Economic growth"
	desc = "Each year our country experiences some natural level of economic growth. This growth rate is partly a factor of historical factors, and partly the result of our current circumstances - such as wars, debt, and economic mobilization policy."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 1 month = december year = 1936 }
	offset = 12
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = march year = 1963 }
	
	action = {
		name = "Show me the stats for this year"
		command = { type = event which = 3001 where = -1 when = 0 }
	}
}
	
event = {
	id = 3001
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	
	name = "Economic growth"
	desc = EVT_3001_DESC
	style = 2

	action = {
		name = ACTION_NAME_OK
		#default 4 percent ic / 2 percent resources
		command = { type = industrial_modifier which = total	value = 2 }
		command = { type = industrial_modifier which = ic		value = 2 }
		
		#Poorer countries generally have higher growth average, up to +4.5% maximum. 1936 stats:
		#command = { 															   type = industrial_modifier which = ic value = 0.0 }	#+0.0% US/UK/Switzerland/Denmark/NewZealand
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { policy = { type = freedom value = 10 } } } type = industrial_modifier which = ic value = 0.5 }	#+0.5% Germany/France/Netherlands/Sweden
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { policy = { type = freedom value = 9  } } } type = industrial_modifier which = ic value = 0.5 }	#+1.0% Canada/Norway/Finland/Argentina
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { policy = { type = freedom value = 8  } } } type = industrial_modifier which = ic value = 0.5 }	#+1.5% Italy/Japan/Hungary/Czechosolovakia
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { policy = { type = freedom value = 7  } } } type = industrial_modifier which = ic value = 0.5 }	#+2.0% USSR/South Africa/Spain/Greece
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { policy = { type = freedom value = 6  } } } type = industrial_modifier which = ic value = 0.5 }	#+2.5% Poland/Portugal/Turkey/Bulgaria
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { policy = { type = freedom value = 5  } } } type = industrial_modifier which = ic value = 0.5 }	#+3.0% Yugoslavia/Thailand/Indonesia/Romania
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { policy = { type = freedom value = 4  } } } type = industrial_modifier which = ic value = 0.5 }	#+3.5% China/India/Kenya/Nigeria
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { policy = { type = freedom value = 3  } } } type = industrial_modifier which = ic value = 0.5 }	#+4.0% Albania/Egypt/Ethiopia/Saudi Arabia
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { policy = { type = freedom value = 2  } } } type = industrial_modifier which = ic value = 0.5 }	#+4.5% Afghanistan/Yemen/Oman/Default new country
		
		#Changes before 1939:
		#+1: Germany, USSR, Austria, Poland, Canada, Norway, Finland, Greece, Venezuela
		#-1: Spain, Nicaragua, Singapore
		command = { trigger = { 
						year = 1938 NOT = { year = 1939 }
						OR = {
							country = GER
							country = AUS
							country = POL
							country = CAN
							country = NOR
							country = FIN
							country = GRE
							country = VEN
							AND = { country = SOV local_flag = { which = SOVAmbition_count when = 1 value = 2 } } #At least 2 years worth of forced modernization
						}
					}
					type = domestic which = freedom value = 1 }
					
		command = { trigger = { 
						year = 1938 NOT = { year = 1939 }
						OR = {
							country = NIC
							AND = {
								OR = {
									country = SPA
									country = SPR
									country = EUS
									country = U52
									country = U69
								}
								local_flag = { which = WARRuin when = 1 value = 12 } #War did not end before the end of 1937
							}
						}
					}
					type = domestic which = freedom value = -1 }
					
	
		
		#Germany and US start with 6
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = Depression	when = 1 value = 1 } } type = industrial_modifier		which = ic			value = 4  }	#Recovering from Great Depression
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = Depression	when = 1 value = 1 } } type = local_setflag when = 1	which = Depression	value = -1 }	#Recovering from Great Depression
		
		#policy-based. At full war mobilization, getting -5.5% yearly growth
		command = { trigger = { policy = { type = defense_lobby value = 1  } } type = industrial_modifier which = ic value = -0.1 } #-0.1
		command = { trigger = { policy = { type = defense_lobby value = 2  } } type = industrial_modifier which = ic value = -0.2 } #-0.3
		command = { trigger = { policy = { type = defense_lobby value = 3  } } type = industrial_modifier which = ic value = -0.3 } #-0.6
		command = { trigger = { policy = { type = defense_lobby value = 4  } } type = industrial_modifier which = ic value = -0.4 } #-1.0
		command = { trigger = { policy = { type = defense_lobby value = 5  } } type = industrial_modifier which = ic value = -0.5 } #-1.5
		command = { trigger = { policy = { type = defense_lobby value = 6  } } type = industrial_modifier which = ic value = -0.6 } #-2.1
		command = { trigger = { policy = { type = defense_lobby value = 7  } } type = industrial_modifier which = ic value = -0.7 } #-2.8
		command = { trigger = { policy = { type = defense_lobby value = 8  } } type = industrial_modifier which = ic value = -0.8 } #-3.6
		command = { trigger = { policy = { type = defense_lobby value = 9  } } type = industrial_modifier which = ic value = -0.9 } #-4.5
		command = { trigger = { policy = { type = defense_lobby value = 10 } } type = industrial_modifier which = ic value = -1.0 } #-5.5
	

		#war-related economic malaise (WARDebt). The WARDebt will decrease over time if economic mobilization is reduced to minimum
		#maximum war debt penalty reaches -5.5% after about 5 consecutive years of total war mobilization
		#UK and France start out with high war debt. Germany low. USA/Italy/Japan medium.
		#USSR debt is a black box. Internal borrowing system is not quantified but should work roughly the same as any other country
		#Given its very limited ability to borrow externally, adding +90% debt to any USSR estimations.
		#command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = WARDebt when = 1 value = 0 } } type = industrial_modifier which = ic value = 0    } #<30% debt to GDP (Germany 1936)
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = WARDebt when = 1 value = 3  } } type = industrial_modifier which = ic value = -0.1 } #30%  debt to GDP (Default new country)
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = WARDebt when = 1 value = 6  } } type = industrial_modifier which = ic value = -0.2 } #60%  debt to GDP (USA 1936; Italy 1936; Spain 1936; Japan 1936)
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = WARDebt when = 1 value = 9  } } type = industrial_modifier which = ic value = -0.3 } #90%  debt to GDP (USSR 1936)
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = WARDebt when = 1 value = 12 } } type = industrial_modifier which = ic value = -0.4 } #120% debt to GDP (USA 1946; Italy 1943)
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = WARDebt when = 1 value = 15 } } type = industrial_modifier which = ic value = -0.5 } #150% debt to GDP (UK 1936; France 1936)
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = WARDebt when = 1 value = 18 } } type = industrial_modifier which = ic value = -0.6 } #180% debt to GDP (USSR 1946)
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = WARDebt when = 1 value = 21 } } type = industrial_modifier which = ic value = -0.7 } #210% debt to GDP
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = WARDebt when = 1 value = 24 } } type = industrial_modifier which = ic value = -0.8 } #240% debt to GDP (UK 1946; France 1946)
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = WARDebt when = 1 value = 27 } } type = industrial_modifier which = ic value = -0.9 } #270% debt to GDP (Germany 1946)
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = WARDebt when = 1 value = 30 } } type = industrial_modifier which = ic value = -1.0 } #300% debt to GDP
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = WARDebt when = 1 value = 33 } } type = dissent value = 15  } #Country is bankrupt, can only fund itself by printing money, population is impoverished as a result
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = WARDebt when = 1 value = 33 } } type = money value = -3000 } #The value of national currency collapses
		
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { local_flag = WAR2 } local_flag = { which = WARDebt when = 1 value = 1 } } type = local_setflag which = WARDebt when = 1 value = -1 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { local_flag = WAR3 } local_flag = { which = WARDebt when = 1 value = 1 } } type = local_setflag which = WARDebt when = 1 value = -1 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { local_flag = WAR4 } local_flag = { which = WARDebt when = 1 value = 1 } } type = local_setflag which = WARDebt when = 1 value = -1 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = WAR5  } type = local_setflag which = WARDebt when = 1 value = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = WAR6  } type = local_setflag which = WARDebt when = 1 value = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = WAR7  } type = local_setflag which = WARDebt when = 1 value = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = WAR8  } type = local_setflag which = WARDebt when = 1 value = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = WAR9  } type = local_setflag which = WARDebt when = 1 value = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = WAR10 } type = local_setflag which = WARDebt when = 1 value = 1 }
		
		#war-related economic destruction (WARRuin).
		#More WarRuin each year if partially occupied (i.e. war is happening in your territory)
		command = { trigger = { atwar = yes OR = { lost_national = { value = 5 } local_flag = inMajorWar } } 	type = industrial_modifier		which = ic 		value = -2 }
		command = { trigger = { atwar = yes OR = { lost_national = { value = 5 } local_flag = inMajorWar } } 	type = local_setflag when = 1	which = WARRuin value =  2 }
		
		#Recovering at 1% per year, if Spain takes a 30% hit, it will take 30 years to fully recover. If civil war ends sooner, it will take less
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = WARRuin when = 1 value = 1 } } 							type = industrial_modifier 	   	which = ic		value =  1 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = WARRuin when = 1 value = 1 } }							type = local_setflag when = 1	which = WARRuin	value = -1 }
		
		#New: Really high WARRuin = faster recovery
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = WARRuin when = 1 value = 15 } } 							type = industrial_modifier 	   	which = ic		value =  1 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = WARRuin when = 1 value = 15 } }							type = local_setflag when = 1	which = WARRuin	value = -1 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = WARRuin when = 1 value = 30 } } 							type = industrial_modifier 	   	which = ic		value =  1 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = WARRuin when = 1 value = 30 } }							type = local_setflag when = 1	which = WARRuin	value = -1 }
		
		
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = RepPay1	when = 1 value = 1 } } type = industrial_modifier		which = ic		value = -1 } #Paying reparations
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = RepPay1	when = 1 value = 1 } } type = local_setflag when = 1	which = RepPay1	value = -1 } #Paying reparations
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = RepRec1	when = 1 value = 1 } } type = industrial_modifier 		which = ic		value =  1 } #Receiving reparations
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = RepRec1	when = 1 value = 1 } } type = local_setflag when = 1	which = RepRec1	value = -1 } #Receiving reparations
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = RepPay2	when = 1 value = 1 } } type = industrial_modifier		which = ic		value = -2 } #Paying reparations
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = RepPay2	when = 1 value = 1 } } type = local_setflag when = 1	which = RepPay2	value = -1 } #Paying reparations
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = RepRec2	when = 1 value = 1 } } type = industrial_modifier 		which = ic		value =  2 } #Receiving reparations
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = RepRec2	when = 1 value = 1 } } type = local_setflag when = 1	which = RepRec2	value = -1 } #Receiving reparations
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = RepPay3	when = 1 value = 1 } } type = industrial_modifier		which = ic		value = -3 } #Paying reparations
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = RepPay3	when = 1 value = 1 } } type = local_setflag when = 1	which = RepPay3	value = -1 } #Paying reparations
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = RepRec3	when = 1 value = 1 } } type = industrial_modifier 		which = ic		value =  3 } #Receiving reparations
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = RepRec3	when = 1 value = 1 } } type = local_setflag when = 1	which = RepRec3	value = -1 } #Receiving reparations
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = RepPay4	when = 1 value = 1 } } type = industrial_modifier		which = ic		value = -4 } #Paying reparations
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = RepPay4	when = 1 value = 1 } } type = local_setflag when = 1	which = RepPay4	value = -1 } #Paying reparations
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = RepRec4	when = 1 value = 1 } } type = industrial_modifier 		which = ic		value =  4 } #Receiving reparations
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = RepRec4	when = 1 value = 1 } } type = local_setflag when = 1	which = RepRec4	value = -1 } #Receiving reparations
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = RepPay5	when = 1 value = 1 } } type = industrial_modifier		which = ic		value = -5 } #Paying reparations
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = RepPay5	when = 1 value = 1 } } type = local_setflag when = 1	which = RepPay5	value = -1 } #Paying reparations
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = RepRec5	when = 1 value = 1 } } type = industrial_modifier 		which = ic		value =  5 } #Receiving reparations
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = RepRec5	when = 1 value = 1 } } type = local_setflag when = 1	which = RepRec5	value = -1 } #Receiving reparations
		
		#Sanctions shock/adjustment, delayed by one year
		command = { trigger = { OR = {  local_flag = SanctionsWar local_flag = SanctionsEvt } NOT = { local_flag = SanctionsAdj } local_flag = SanctionsDelay1 } type = industrial_modifier	which = ic	  value = -8 }
		command = { trigger = { OR = {  local_flag = SanctionsWar local_flag = SanctionsEvt } NOT = { local_flag = SanctionsAdj } local_flag = SanctionsDelay1 } type = local_setflag 		which = SanctionsAdj 	 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { local_flag = SanctionsWar local_flag = SanctionsEvt 		  local_flag = SanctionsDelay1 } local_flag = SanctionsAdj } type = local_clrflag 		which = SanctionsDelay1  }
		command = { trigger = { OR = {  local_flag = SanctionsWar local_flag = SanctionsEvt } NOT = { local_flag = SanctionsAdj local_flag = SanctionsDelay1 } } type = local_setflag 		which = SanctionsDelay1  }
		#Sanctions lifted, rebounce delayed by one year
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { local_flag = SanctionsWar local_flag = SanctionsEvt } local_flag = SanctionsDelay2 local_flag = SanctionsAdj } 			 type = industrial_modifier	which = ic	  value = 8  }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { local_flag = SanctionsWar local_flag = SanctionsEvt } local_flag = SanctionsDelay2 local_flag = SanctionsAdj } 			 type = local_clrflag 		which = SanctionsAdj     }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { local_flag = SanctionsWar local_flag = SanctionsEvt } local_flag = SanctionsDelay2 							 } 			 type = local_clrflag 		which = SanctionsDelay2  }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { local_flag = SanctionsWar local_flag = SanctionsEvt local_flag = SanctionsDelay2 } local_flag = SanctionsAdj } 			 type = local_setflag 		which = SanctionsDelay2  }
		#Sanctions persistent, -1% growth reduction per year
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = SanctionsAdj } 																									 type = industrial_modifier which = ic	  value = -1 }
		
		#Militarism variance, -1% GDP growth at full militarism
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = MIL_level when = 0 value = 1		} }						type = industrial_modifier which = ic	  value = -0.1 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = MIL_level when = 0 value = 2		} }						type = industrial_modifier which = ic	  value = -0.2 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = MIL_level when = 0 value = 3		} }						type = industrial_modifier which = ic	  value = -0.3 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = MIL_level when = 0 value = 4		} }						type = industrial_modifier which = ic	  value = -0.4 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = MIL_level when = 0 value = 5		} }						type = industrial_modifier which = ic	  value = -0.5 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = MIL_level when = 0 value = 6		} }						type = industrial_modifier which = ic	  value = -0.6 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = MIL_level when = 0 value = 7		} }						type = industrial_modifier which = ic	  value = -0.7 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = MIL_level when = 0 value = 8		} }						type = industrial_modifier which = ic	  value = -0.8 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = MIL_level when = 0 value = 9		} }						type = industrial_modifier which = ic	  value = -0.9 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = MIL_level when = 0 value = 10	} }						type = industrial_modifier which = ic	  value = -1.0 }
		
		
		#Semi-Historical variance:
		
		#USSR historic growth rates 1935-1939: 15% 8% 10% 5% 8%
		#USSR base 2.5%, +4% growth with forced modernization, it also has a separate event chain for IC/infrastructure construction (150041). Builds +10 ic or approximately +3% over initial. Total: 9.5%
		command = { trigger = { country = SOV 						   } type = industrial_modifier which = ic value = 1  }
		command = { trigger = { country = SOV local_flag = SOVAmbition } type = industrial_modifier which = ic value = 3  }
		
		#Spain historic growth rates 1935-1939: 2% -24% -7% 0% 10%
		#Partly covered by the WARRuin logic (-4% or more) + High Economic mobilization (-3.6%?) + Sanctions (-8%)
		#Spain's economic performance diverges significantly between Nationalist and Republican zones so will be covered separately.

		
		#China historic growth rates 1935-1939: 8% 6% -2% ?% ?%
		#Should be mostly covered by the poor country boost, but adding +1% also due to the enormous population potential. Same with India
		command = { trigger = { country = CHI } type = industrial_modifier which = ic value = 1  }
		command = { trigger = { country = CHC } type = industrial_modifier which = ic value = 1  }
		command = { trigger = { country = IND } type = industrial_modifier which = ic value = 1  }
		command = { trigger = { country = U02 } type = industrial_modifier which = ic value = 1  }
		
		#Germany historic growth rates 1935-1939: 8% 9% 11% 10% 9%
		#Mostly covered by Depression recovery and low sovereign debt. Adding +1% on top to match the historical rate of ~10%
		command = { trigger = { country = GER } type = industrial_modifier which = ic value = 1  }
		command = { trigger = { country = DFR } type = industrial_modifier which = ic value = 1  }
		command = { trigger = { country = DDR } type = industrial_modifier which = ic value = 1  }
		command = { trigger = { country = U08 } type = industrial_modifier which = ic value = 1  }

		#Italy historic growth rates 1935-1939: 5% -4% 10% 3% 6%
		#Covered by sanctions adjustment/lifted
		#command = { trigger = { country = ITA year = 1936 NOT = { year = 1937 } } type = industrial_modifier which = ic value = -8  }
		#command = { trigger = { country = ITA year = 1937 NOT = { year = 1938 } } type = industrial_modifier which = ic value = 5   }
		
		#USA historic growth rates 1935-1939: 12% 10% 8% -6% 7%
		#Mostly covered by Depression recovery and low debt. Adding 1938 recession
		command = { trigger = { country = USA year = 1938 NOT = { year = 1939 } } type = industrial_modifier which = ic  value = -14 }
		
		#France historic growth rates 1935-1939: -3% 4% 6% 0% 7%
		#Mostly covered by high sovereign debt, adding exceptionally good 1937/1939 and bad 1938 (probably fallout from US recession)
		command = { trigger = { country = FRA year = 1937 NOT = { year = 1938 } } type = industrial_modifier which = ic  value = 3   }
		command = { trigger = { country = FRA year = 1938 NOT = { year = 1939 } } type = industrial_modifier which = ic  value = -3  }
		command = { trigger = { country = FRA year = 1939 NOT = { year = 1940 } } type = industrial_modifier which = ic  value = 4   }
		
		#UK historic growth rates 1935-1939: 4% 5% 3% 1% 1%
		#Covered by high sovereign debt and later lend lease boost
		
		#Japan historic growth rates 1935-1939: 4% 6% 4% 5% 14%
		#Covered by the poor country boost, adding exceptionally good 1939 (partially the delayed effect of the 1938 National General Mobilization Law?)
		command = { trigger = { country = JAP year = 1939 NOT = { year = 1940 } } type = industrial_modifier which = ic  value = 4   }

		command = { type = local_setflag which = EconomicGrowth when = 1 value = 1 }
	}
}



event = {
	id = 3002
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	TAG = { AFG ALB ALG ANG ARA ARG ARM AST AUS AZB BEL BEN BHU BLR BOL BOS BRA BRU BUL BUR CAL CAM CAN CGX CHC CHI CHL CMB COL CON COS CRO CSA CSX CUB CXB CYN CYP CZE DDR DEN DFR DOM EAF ECU EGY ENG EQA EST ETH EUS FIN FLA FRA GAB GEO GER GLD GRE GUA GUI GUY HAI HOL HON HUN ICL IDC IND INO IRE IRQ ISR ITA JAP JOR KAZ KOR KUR KYG LAO LAT LBY LEB LIB LIT LUX MAD MAL MAN MEN MEX MLY MON MOR MOZ MTN NAM NEP NIC NIG NOR NZL OMN OTT PAK PAL PAN PAR PER PHI POL POR PRI PRK PRU QUE RHO ROM RSI RUS SAF SAL SAR SAU SCA SCH SCO SER SIA SIB SIE SIK SLO SLV SOM SOV SPA SPR SUD SWE SYR TAJ TAN TEX TIB TRA TRK TUN TUR UKR URU USA UZB VEN VIE WLL YEM YUG U01 U02 U03 U04 U05 U06 U08 U09 U10 U11 U12 U13 U14 U15 U16 U17 U18 U19 U20 U21 U22 U23 U24 U25 U26 U27 U28 U29 U30 U31 U32 U33 U34 U35 U36 U39 U40 U41 U42 U43 U44 U45 U46 U47 U48 U49 U50 U51 U52 U53 U54 U55 U56 U57 U58 U59 U60 U61 U62 U63 U64 U65 U66 U67 U68 U69 U70 U71 U72 U73 U74 U75 U76 U77 U78 U79 U80 U81 U82 U83 U84 U85 U86 U87 U88 U89 U90 U91 U92 U93 U94 U95 U96 U97 U98 U99 USN UIC UTL UAU UPS UCH UBO UCS URO UER UGS UPE UTC }

	trigger = {
		NOT = { local_flag = SanctionsWar }
		OR = {
			AND = {
				war = { country = USA }
				NOT = { non_aggression = { country = USA } }
			}
			AND = {
				war = { country = ENG }
				NOT = { non_aggression = { country = ENG } }
			}
		}
	}
	
	name = "Economic sanctions imposed"
	desc = "The United States and Great Britain are the leading economic giants and together they increasingly form a single financial bloc. As such, they have a financial weapon which they can use against us even in peacetime - sanctions. Any conflict against Great Britain and the US will result in sanctions which will hurt our economy. While the initial sanctions-shock is short lived, in the long run, sanctions will continue to depress our economic growth by -1/% per year."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1914 }
	offset = 15
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = march year = 1963 }

	action = {
		name = ACTION_NAME_OK
		command = { type = local_setflag which = SanctionsWar }
	}
}

	id = 3003
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	TAG = { AFG ALB ALG ANG ARA ARG ARM AST AUS AZB BEL BEN BHU BLR BOL BOS BRA BRU BUL BUR CAL CAM CAN CGX CHC CHI CHL CMB COL CON COS CRO CSA CSX CUB CXB CYN CYP CZE DDR DEN DFR DOM EAF ECU EGY ENG EQA EST ETH EUS FIN FLA FRA GAB GEO GER GLD GRE GUA GUI GUY HAI HOL HON HUN ICL IDC IND INO IRE IRQ ISR ITA JAP JOR KAZ KOR KUR KYG LAO LAT LBY LEB LIB LIT LUX MAD MAL MAN MEN MEX MLY MON MOR MOZ MTN NAM NEP NIC NIG NOR NZL OMN OTT PAK PAL PAN PAR PER PHI POL POR PRI PRK PRU QUE RHO ROM RSI RUS SAF SAL SAR SAU SCA SCH SCO SER SIA SIB SIE SIK SLO SLV SOM SOV SPA SPR SUD SWE SYR TAJ TAN TEX TIB TRA TRK TUN TUR UKR URU USA UZB VEN VIE WLL YEM YUG U01 U02 U03 U04 U05 U06 U08 U09 U10 U11 U12 U13 U14 U15 U16 U17 U18 U19 U20 U21 U22 U23 U24 U25 U26 U27 U28 U29 U30 U31 U32 U33 U34 U35 U36 U39 U40 U41 U42 U43 U44 U45 U46 U47 U48 U49 U50 U51 U52 U53 U54 U55 U56 U57 U58 U59 U60 U61 U62 U63 U64 U65 U66 U67 U68 U69 U70 U71 U72 U73 U74 U75 U76 U77 U78 U79 U80 U81 U82 U83 U84 U85 U86 U87 U88 U89 U90 U91 U92 U93 U94 U95 U96 U97 U98 U99 USN UIC UTL UAU UPS UCH UBO UCS URO UER UGS UPE UTC }

	trigger = {
		local_flag = SanctionsWar
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				war = { country = USA }
				NOT = { non_aggression = { country = USA } }
			}
			AND = {
				war = { country = ENG }
				NOT = { non_aggression = { country = ENG } }
			}
		}
	}
	
	name = "Economic sanctions lifted"
	desc = "The United States and Great Britain are the leading economic giants and together they increasingly form a single financial bloc. As such, they have a financial weapon which they can use against us even in peacetime - sanctions. Any conflict against Great Britain and the US will result in sanctions which will hurt our economy. Since we are no longer at war with either UK or Great Britain, the harshest economic sanctions and embargoes against us have been lifted."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1914 }
	offset = 15
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = march year = 1963 }

	action = {
		name = ACTION_NAME_OK
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SanctionsWar }
	}
}

			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = { which = mpLossesCount when = 1 value = 192 } }

			}

				NOT = { local_flag = { which = mpLossesCount when = 1 value = 194 } }
				losses = 19400000

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = { which = mpLossesCount when = 1 value = 196 } }

				NOT = { local_flag = { which = mpLossesCount when = 1 value = 198 } }
				losses = 19800000
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = { which = mpLossesCount when = 1 value = 200 } }
				losses = 20000000
			}
		}
	}
   
	name = "Casualties of war"
	desc = "Our casualty count grows without a clear victory in sight. Our populace is growing increasingly restless as they keep losing their friends and loved ones in an endless war of attrition."
	style = 2
	picture = "Wehrmacht"
	decision_picture = "decision_german_total_war"
	
	date = { day = 0 month = january year = 1914 }
	offset = 30
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1963 }

	
	action = {
		name = "ACTION_NAME_DAMN" # Damn !
		trigger = { NOT = { AND = { country = SOV local_flag = SOVterror1 local_flag = SOVterror2 local_flag = SOVterror3 } } }
		
		#experience is the best teacher
		command = { type = gain_tech 			which = -1 }
		
		#-1% temporary, -0.1% permanent GDP loss for each 200,000 casualties. WarRuin disabled until i can figure out how to improve it. Might have to just do it manually for different countries
		command = { type = industrial_modifier 	which = ic 					value = -0.1 }
		#command = { type = industrial_modifier which = ic	 				value = -1.0 } 
		#command = { type = local_setflag 		which = WARRuin when = 1 	value = 1    }
		
		command = { type = local_setflag 		which = mpLossesCount 		value = 2 when = 1 }
		
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = mpLossesCount when = 1 value = 10  } } type = dissent value = 0.1 } #0.1
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = mpLossesCount when = 1 value = 20  } } type = dissent value = 0.1 } #0.2
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = mpLossesCount when = 1 value = 30  } } type = dissent value = 0.1 } #0.3
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = mpLossesCount when = 1 value = 40  } } type = dissent value = 0.1 } #0.4
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = mpLossesCount when = 1 value = 50  } } type = dissent value = 0.1 } #0.5
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = mpLossesCount when = 1 value = 60  } } type = dissent value = 0.1 } #0.6
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = mpLossesCount when = 1 value = 70  } } type = dissent value = 0.1 } #0.7
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = mpLossesCount when = 1 value = 80  } } type = dissent value = 0.1 } #0.8
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = mpLossesCount when = 1 value = 90  } } type = dissent value = 0.1 } #0.9
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = mpLossesCount when = 1 value = 100 } } type = dissent value = 0.1 } #1.0
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = mpLossesCount when = 1 value = 110 } } type = dissent value = 0.1 } #1.1
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = mpLossesCount when = 1 value = 120 } } type = dissent value = 0.1 } #1.2
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = mpLossesCount when = 1 value = 130 } } type = dissent value = 0.1 } #1.3
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = mpLossesCount when = 1 value = 140 } } type = dissent value = 0.1 } #1.4
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = mpLossesCount when = 1 value = 150 } } type = dissent value = 0.1 } #1.5
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = mpLossesCount when = 1 value = 160 } } type = dissent value = 0.1 } #1.6
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = mpLossesCount when = 1 value = 170 } } type = dissent value = 0.1 } #1.7
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = mpLossesCount when = 1 value = 180 } } type = dissent value = 0.1 } #1.8
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = mpLossesCount when = 1 value = 190 } } type = dissent value = 0.1 } #1.9
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = mpLossesCount when = 1 value = 200 } } type = dissent value = 0.1 } #2.0
	}
	action = {
		name = "ACTION_NAME_DAMN" # Damn !
		trigger = { AND = { country = SOV local_flag = SOVterror1 local_flag = SOVterror2 local_flag = SOVterror3 } }
		#Soviets can tolerate greater losses if went through the purge chain
		
		#experience is the best teacher
		command = { type = gain_tech 			which = -1 }
		
		#-1% temporary, -0.1% permanent GDP loss for each 200,000 casualties. WarRuin disabled until i can figure out how to improve it. Might have to just do it manually for different countries
		command = { type = industrial_modifier 	which = ic 					value = -0.1 }
		#command = { type = industrial_modifier which = ic	 				value = -1.0 } 
		#command = { type = local_setflag 		which = WARRuin when = 1 	value = 1    }
		
		command = { type = local_setflag 		which = mpLossesCount 		value = 2 when = 1 }
		
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = mpLossesCount when = 1 value = 20  } } type = dissent value = 0.1 } #0.1
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = mpLossesCount when = 1 value = 40  } } type = dissent value = 0.1 } #0.2
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = mpLossesCount when = 1 value = 60  } } type = dissent value = 0.1 } #0.3
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = mpLossesCount when = 1 value = 80  } } type = dissent value = 0.1 } #0.4
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = mpLossesCount when = 1 value = 100 } } type = dissent value = 0.1 } #0.5
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = mpLossesCount when = 1 value = 120 } } type = dissent value = 0.1 } #0.6
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = mpLossesCount when = 1 value = 140 } } type = dissent value = 0.1 } #0.7
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = mpLossesCount when = 1 value = 160 } } type = dissent value = 0.1 } #0.8
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = mpLossesCount when = 1 value = 180 } } type = dissent value = 0.1 } #0.9
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = mpLossesCount when = 1 value = 200 } } type = dissent value = 0.1 } #1.0
	}
}

event = { #Supply constraints
	id = 3011
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	#invisible
	#TAG = { AFG ALB ALG ANG ARA ARG ARM AST AUS AZB BEL BEN BHU BLR BOL BOS BRA BRU BUL BUR CAL CAM CAN CGX CHC CHI CHL CMB COL CON COS CRO CSA CSX CUB CXB CYN CYP CZE DDR DEN DFR DOM EAF ECU EGY ENG EQA EST ETH EUS FIN FLA FRA GAB GEO GER GLD GRE GUA GUI GUY HAI HOL HON HUN ICL IDC IND INO IRE IRQ ISR ITA JAP JOR KAZ KOR KUR KYG LAO LAT LBY LEB LIB LIT LUX MAD MAL MAN MEN MEX MLY MON MOR MOZ MTN NAM NEP NIC NIG NOR NZL OMN OTT PAK PAL PAN PAR PER PHI POL POR PRI PRK PRU QUE RHO ROM RSI RUS SAF SAL SAR SAU SCA SCH SCO SER SIA SIB SIE SIK SLO SLV SOM SOV SPA SPR SUD SWE SYR TAJ TAN TEX TIB TRA TRK TUN TUR UKR URU USA UZB VEN VIE WLL YEM YUG U01 U02 U03 U04 U05 U06 U08 U09 U10 U11 U12 U13 U14 U15 U16 U17 U18 U19 U20 U21 U22 U23 U24 U25 U26 U27 U28 U29 U30 U31 U32 U33 U34 U35 U36 U39 U40 U41 U42 U43 U44 U45 U46 U47 U48 U49 U50 U51 U52 U53 U54 U55 U56 U57 U58 U59 U60 U61 U62 U63 U64 U65 U66 U67 U68 U69 U70 U71 U72 U73 U74 U75 U76 U77 U78 U79 U80 U81 U82 U83 U84 U85 U86 U87 U88 U89 U90 U91 U92 U93 U94 U95 U96 U97 U98 U99 USN UIC UTL UAU UPS UCH UBO UCS URO UER UGS UPE UTC }
	
	trigger = {	
		local_flag = AllInit
		NOT = { local_flag = shortages }
		NOT = { supplies = 150 }
		OR = {
			AND = {
				army = { size = 5 }
				NOT = { ic = 3 }
			}
			AND = {
				army = { size = 10 }
				NOT = { ic = 4 }
			}
			AND = {
				army = { size = 15 }
				NOT = { ic = 5 }
			}
			AND = {
				army = { size = 20 }
				NOT = { ic = 7.5 }
			}
			AND = {
				army = { size = 30 }
				NOT = { ic = 10 }
			}
			AND = {
				army = { size = 45 }
				NOT = { ic = 15 }
			}
			AND = {
				army = { size = 60 }
				NOT = { ic = 20 }
			}
			AND = {
				army = { size = 75 }
				NOT = { ic = 25 }
			}
			AND = {
				army = { size = 90 }
				NOT = { ic = 30 }
			}
			AND = {
				army = { size = 105 }
				NOT = { ic = 35 }
			}
			AND = {
				army = { size = 120 }
				NOT = { ic = 40 }
			}
			AND = {
				army = { size = 135 }
				NOT = { ic = 45 }
			}
			AND = {
				army = { size = 150 }
				NOT = { ic = 50 }
			}
			AND = {
				army = { size = 165 }
				NOT = { ic = 55 }
			}
			AND = {
				army = { size = 180 }
				NOT = { ic = 60 }
			}
			AND = {
				army = { size = 195 }
				NOT = { ic = 65 }
			}
			AND = {
				army = { size = 210 }
				NOT = { ic = 70 }
			}
			AND = {
				army = { size = 225 }
				NOT = { ic = 75 }
			}
			AND = {
				army = { size = 240 }
				NOT = { ic = 80 }
			}
			AND = {
				army = { size = 255 }
				NOT = { ic = 85 }
			}
			AND = {
				army = { size = 280 }
				NOT = { ic = 90 }
			}
		}
	}
   
	name = "Supply shortages"
	desc = "Our supply stockpile is getting critically low. We are getting increasing complaints from local commanders that the armed forces are lacking adequate provision to continue fighting at any reasonable capacity. We have 15 days to fix the problem and procure at least 100 supplies in our stockpile, otherwise we will face serious consequences."
	picture = "mds_supplies1"
	style = 2
	
	date = { day = 0 month = february year = 1936 }
	offset = 3
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		name = "Where's the ammunition!?!"
		command = { type = local_setflag which = shortages }
		command = { type = event which = 3012 where = -1 when = 15 }
		command = { type = event which = 3013 where = -1 when = 15 }
	}
}

event = { #Supply constraints
	id = 3012
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	#visible
	TAG = { AFG ALB ALG ANG ARA ARG ARM AST AUS AZB BEL BEN BHU BLR BOL BOS BRA BRU BUL BUR CAL CAM CAN CGX CHC CHI CHL CMB COL CON COS CRO CSA CSX CUB CXB CYN CYP CZE DDR DEN DFR DOM EAF ECU EGY ENG EQA EST ETH EUS FIN FLA FRA GAB GEO GER GLD GRE GUA GUI GUY HAI HOL HON HUN ICL IDC IND INO IRE IRQ ISR ITA JAP JOR KAZ KOR KUR KYG LAO LAT LBY LEB LIB LIT LUX MAD MAL MAN MEN MEX MLY MON MOR MOZ MTN NAM NEP NIC NIG NOR NZL OMN OTT PAK PAL PAN PAR PER PHI POL POR PRI PRK PRU QUE RHO ROM RSI RUS SAF SAL SAR SAU SCA SCH SCO SER SIA SIB SIE SIK SLO SLV SOM SOV SPA SPR SUD SWE SYR TAJ TAN TEX TIB TRA TRK TUN TUR UKR URU USA UZB VEN VIE WLL YEM YUG U01 U02 U03 U04 U05 U06 U08 U09 U10 U11 U12 U13 U14 U15 U16 U17 U18 U19 U20 U21 U22 U23 U24 U25 U26 U27 U28 U29 U30 U31 U32 U33 U34 U35 U36 U39 U40 U41 U42 U43 U44 U45 U46 U47 U48 U49 U50 U51 U52 U53 U54 U55 U56 U57 U58 U59 U60 U61 U62 U63 U64 U65 U66 U67 U68 U69 U70 U71 U72 U73 U74 U75 U76 U77 U78 U79 U80 U81 U82 U83 U84 U85 U86 U87 U88 U89 U90 U91 U92 U93 U94 U95 U96 U97 U98 U99 USN UIC UTL UAU UPS UCH UBO UCS URO UER UGS UPE UTC }
	
	name = "Supply shortages worsen"
	desc = "Our industry is proving to be woefully incapable of supplying our troops, resulting in many soldiers going to the front without rifles, without armor, without ammunition, and often without food. This situation is untenable and it is causing our armed forces to suffer increased casualties, rampant desertions, and mutinies. Some prominent commanders are threatening a vague 'March of Justice' by taking matters into their own hands! We must act now or our army will completely disintegrate!"
	picture = "mds_supplies2"
	style = 2
	
	action = {
		name = "Where's the ammunition!?!"
		trigger = {
			army = 5
			NOT = { supplies = 100 }
		}
		command = { type = dissent value = 0.1 } 
		command = { type = strength which = land 	when = 1 where = 0 value = -0.01 } #MP added back to MP pool
		command = { type = strength which = naval 	when = 1 where = 0 value = -0.01 } #MP added back to MP pool
		command = { type = strength which = air 	when = 1 where = 0 value = -0.01 } #MP added back to MP pool
		
		#will scrap the most obsolete or damaged units first. Max 5 army, 1 navy, 1 air
		#MP is added back to MP pool
		command = { 																			type = demobilize which = land 	when = 0 where = 0 value = -1 }
		command = { trigger = { army = { size = 10 type = 1 when = 0 where = 0 which = 0 } } 	type = demobilize which = land 	when = 0 where = 0 value = -1 }
		command = { trigger = { army = { size = 20 type = 1 when = 0 where = 0 which = 0 } } 	type = demobilize which = land 	when = 0 where = 0 value = -1 }
		command = { trigger = { army = { size = 30 type = 1 when = 0 where = 0 which = 0 } } 	type = demobilize which = land 	when = 0 where = 0 value = -1 }
		command = { trigger = { army = { size = 40 type = 1 when = 0 where = 0 which = 0 } } 	type = demobilize which = land 	when = 0 where = 0 value = -1 }
		command = { trigger = { navy = { size = 3  type = 1 when = 0 where = 0 which = 0 } } 	type = demobilize which = naval when = 0 where = 0 value = -1 }
		command = { trigger = {  air = { size = 2  type = 1 when = 0 where = 0 which = 0 } } 	type = demobilize which = air  	when = 0 where = 0 value = -1 }
		
		command = { type = local_setflag which = shortagesCounter when = 1 value = 1 }
		command = { type = local_setflag which = shortages }
		
		command = { type = event which = 3012 where = -1 when = 5 }
		command = { type = event which = 3013 where = -1 when = 5 }
	}
}
event = { #Supply constraints
	id = 3013
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	#invisible
	#TAG = { AFG ALB ALG ANG ARA ARG ARM AST AUS AZB BEL BEN BHU BLR BOL BOS BRA BRU BUL BUR CAL CAM CAN CGX CHC CHI CHL CMB COL CON COS CRO CSA CSX CUB CXB CYN CYP CZE DDR DEN DFR DOM EAF ECU EGY ENG EQA EST ETH EUS FIN FLA FRA GAB GEO GER GLD GRE GUA GUI GUY HAI HOL HON HUN ICL IDC IND INO IRE IRQ ISR ITA JAP JOR KAZ KOR KUR KYG LAO LAT LBY LEB LIB LIT LUX MAD MAL MAN MEN MEX MLY MON MOR MOZ MTN NAM NEP NIC NIG NOR NZL OMN OTT PAK PAL PAN PAR PER PHI POL POR PRI PRK PRU QUE RHO ROM RSI RUS SAF SAL SAR SAU SCA SCH SCO SER SIA SIB SIE SIK SLO SLV SOM SOV SPA SPR SUD SWE SYR TAJ TAN TEX TIB TRA TRK TUN TUR UKR URU USA UZB VEN VIE WLL YEM YUG U01 U02 U03 U04 U05 U06 U08 U09 U10 U11 U12 U13 U14 U15 U16 U17 U18 U19 U20 U21 U22 U23 U24 U25 U26 U27 U28 U29 U30 U31 U32 U33 U34 U35 U36 U39 U40 U41 U42 U43 U44 U45 U46 U47 U48 U49 U50 U51 U52 U53 U54 U55 U56 U57 U58 U59 U60 U61 U62 U63 U64 U65 U66 U67 U68 U69 U70 U71 U72 U73 U74 U75 U76 U77 U78 U79 U80 U81 U82 U83 U84 U85 U86 U87 U88 U89 U90 U91 U92 U93 U94 U95 U96 U97 U98 U99 USN UIC UTL UAU UPS UCH UBO UCS URO UER UGS UPE UTC }
	
	name = "Supply situation improves"
	desc = "The Defense Ministry and all relevant government agencies were alerted to the situation with supply provisioning and took urgent steps to address the problem. The situation is still far from stable, but already we are seeing clear signs of improvement and unreast among the troops is easing."
	picture = "mds_supplies3"
	style = 2
	
	action = {
		name = "The situation stabilizes, for now"
		trigger = {
			local_flag = shortages
			OR = {
				NOT = { army = 5 }
				supplies = 100
			}
				
		}
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = shortages }
	}
}



event = {
	id = 3021
	persistent = yes
	
	name = "Reparations"
	desc = "Our defeated former enemy signed a treaty promising several years worth of reparation payments to our country. This will significantly boost our economic growth in the coming years." 
	style = 2
	
	action = {
		name = "Great!"
		command = { trigger = { flag = { which = RepPec when = 1 value = 1  } } type = local_setflag when = 1 which = RepRec1 value = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { flag = { which = RepPec when = 1 value = 2  } } type = local_setflag when = 1 which = RepRec1 value = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { flag = { which = RepPec when = 1 value = 3  } } type = local_setflag when = 1 which = RepRec1 value = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { flag = { which = RepPec when = 1 value = 4  } } type = local_setflag when = 1 which = RepRec1 value = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { flag = { which = RepPec when = 1 value = 5  } } type = local_setflag when = 1 which = RepRec1 value = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { flag = { which = RepPec when = 1 value = 6  } } type = local_setflag when = 1 which = RepRec1 value = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { flag = { which = RepPec when = 1 value = 7  } } type = local_setflag when = 1 which = RepRec1 value = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { flag = { which = RepPec when = 1 value = 8  } } type = local_setflag when = 1 which = RepRec1 value = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { flag = { which = RepPec when = 1 value = 9  } } type = local_setflag when = 1 which = RepRec1 value = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { flag = { which = RepPec when = 1 value = 10 } } type = local_setflag when = 1 which = RepRec1 value = 1 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 3030
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	#invisible
	#Ideally, hawk lobby slider move events should handle this as well, but there are certain scenarios where they might not do it
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
				NOT = {	atwar = yes }
				policy = { type = democratic value = 2 }
			}
			AND = {
				atwar = yes
				NOT = { policy = { type = democratic value = 2 } }
			}
		}
	}
	
	name = "War and Peace"
	desc = "This event helps override the hardcoded 50% Consumer Goods demand reduction from being at war"
	style = 2
	picture = "news_paper"

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1913 }
	offset = 30
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = march year = 1963 }

	action = {
		name = "War, what is it good for?"
		command = { trigger = { atwar = yes policy = { type = defense_lobby value = 10 } 													 } type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 10 }
		command = { trigger = { atwar = yes policy = { type = defense_lobby value =  9 } NOT = { policy = { type = democratic value = 10 } } } type = set_domestic which = democratic value =  9 }
		command = { trigger = { atwar = yes policy = { type = defense_lobby value =  8 } NOT = { policy = { type = democratic value =  9 } } } type = set_domestic which = democratic value =  8 }
		command = { trigger = { atwar = yes policy = { type = defense_lobby value =  7 } NOT = { policy = { type = democratic value =  8 } } } type = set_domestic which = democratic value =  7 }
		command = { trigger = { atwar = yes policy = { type = defense_lobby value =  6 } NOT = { policy = { type = democratic value =  7 } } } type = set_domestic which = democratic value =  6 }
		command = { trigger = { atwar = yes policy = { type = defense_lobby value =  5 } NOT = { policy = { type = democratic value =  6 } } } type = set_domestic which = democratic value =  5 }
		command = { trigger = { atwar = yes policy = { type = defense_lobby value =  4 } NOT = { policy = { type = democratic value =  5 } } } type = set_domestic which = democratic value =  4 }
		command = { trigger = { atwar = yes policy = { type = defense_lobby value =  3 } NOT = { policy = { type = democratic value =  4 } } } type = set_domestic which = democratic value =  3 }
		command = { trigger = { atwar = yes policy = { type = defense_lobby value =  2 } NOT = { policy = { type = democratic value =  3 } } } type = set_domestic which = democratic value =  2 }
		command = { trigger = { atwar = yes policy = { type = defense_lobby value =  1 } NOT = { policy = { type = democratic value =  2 } } } type = set_domestic which = democratic value =  2 }
		command = { trigger = { atwar = no } 																								   type = set_domestic which = democratic value =  1 }
		command = { trigger = { atwar = no }																								   type = local_clrflag which = war_preparedness	 }
	}
}

#Low development effects

event = {
	id = 3040
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	#invisible
	
	trigger = {
		local_flag = AllInit
		OR = {
			AND = {
				policy = { 			type = freedom value = 1 }
				NOT = { policy = { 	type = freedom value = 2 } } 
				NOT = { local_flag = { which = DEV_level when = 0 value = 1 } }
			}
			AND = {
				policy = { 			type = freedom value = 2 }
				NOT = { policy = { 	type = freedom value = 3 } } 
				NOT = { local_flag = { which = DEV_level when = 0 value = 2 } }
			}
			AND = {
				policy = { 			type = freedom value = 3 }
				NOT = { policy = { 	type = freedom value = 4 } } 
				NOT = { local_flag = { which = DEV_level when = 0 value = 3 } }
			}
			AND = {
				policy = { 			type = freedom value = 4 }
				NOT = { policy = { 	type = freedom value = 5 } } 
				NOT = { local_flag = { which = DEV_level when = 0 value = 4 } }
			}
			AND = {
				policy = { 			type = freedom value = 5 }
				NOT = { policy = { 	type = freedom value = 6 } } 
				NOT = { local_flag = { which = DEV_level when = 0 value = 5 } }
			}
			AND = {
				policy = { 			type = freedom value = 6 }
				NOT = { policy = { 	type = freedom value = 7 } } 
				NOT = { local_flag = { which = DEV_level when = 0 value = 6 } }
			}
			AND = {
				policy = { 			type = freedom value = 7 }
				NOT = { policy = { 	type = freedom value = 8 } } 
				NOT = { local_flag = { which = DEV_level when = 0 value = 7 } }
			}
			AND = {
				policy = { 			type = freedom value = 8 }
				NOT = { policy = { 	type = freedom value = 9 } } 
				NOT = { local_flag = { which = DEV_level when = 0 value = 8 } }
			}
			AND = {
				policy = { 			type = freedom value = 9 }
				NOT = { policy = { 	type = freedom value = 10 } } 
				NOT = { local_flag = { which = DEV_level when = 0 value = 9 } }
			}
			AND = {
				policy = { type = freedom value = 10 }
				NOT = { local_flag = { which = DEV_level when = 0 value = 10 } }
			}
		}
	}
	
	name = "Development level"
	desc = "A large economic base is important, but the size of our economy alone does not reflect our ability to field a modern army. What's equally important is our development level, or how advanced our economy is compared to peers. If the IC is roughly equivalent to our GDP, then our development level is our GDP per capita. Countries with low development level will tend to lag behind in research and will find it very difficult to build or upgrade modern weapons, be it tanks or warplanes. For that reason, they may also find it more advantageous to run a trade surplus which accumulates currency reserves, and then use those reserves to purchase tanks and aircraft from more advanced nations."
	style = 2
	picture = "news_paper"

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1913 }
	offset = 2
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = march year = 1963 }

	#	none, artillery, sp_artillery, rocket_artillery, sp_rct_artillery, anti_tank, tank_destroyer,
	#	light_armor_brigade, heavy_armor, super_heavy_armor, armored_car, anti_air, police, engineer,
	#	cag, escort, naval_asw, naval_anti_air_s, naval_radar_s, naval_fire_controll_s, naval_improved_hull_s,
	#	naval_torpedoes_s, naval_anti_air_l, naval_radar_l, naval_fire_controll_l, naval_improved_hull_l,
	#	naval_torpedoes_l, cavalry_brigade, sp_anti_air, medium_armor, floatplane,
	#	light_cag, amph_armor, glider_armor, glider_artillery, super_heavy_artillery

	action = {
		name = ACTION_NAME_OK

		command = { 																	type = build_cost which = infantry 			when = now where = relative value = -23 }

		command = { type = ground_def_eff 																							when = 1					value = 0.25 }
		command = { type = local_setflag which = DEV_level when = 0 value = 6 }
	}
	action = {
		name = ACTION_NAME_OK

		command = { type = local_setflag which = DEV_level when = 0 value = 7 }
	}
	action = {
		name = ACTION_NAME_OK
		trigger = { policy = { type = freedom value = 8 } NOT = { policy = { type = freedom value = 9 } } }

		command = { 																	type = build_cost which = infantry 			when = now where = relative value = -8  }

		command = { type = ground_def_eff 																							when = 1					value = 0.35 }
		command = { type = local_setflag which = DEV_level when = 0 value = 8 }
	}
	action = {
		name = ACTION_NAME_OK
		trigger = { policy = { type = freedom value = 9 } NOT = { policy = { type = freedom value = 10 } } }

#Militarized nation effects

event = {
	id = 3050
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	#invisible
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
				policy = { 			type = interventionism value = 1 }
				NOT = { policy = { 	type = interventionism value = 2 } } 
				NOT = { local_flag = { which = MIL_level when = 0 value = 1 } }
			}
			AND = {
				policy = { 			type = interventionism value = 2 }
				NOT = { policy = { 	type = interventionism value = 3 } } 
				NOT = { local_flag = { which = MIL_level when = 0 value = 2 } }
			}
			AND = {
				policy = { 			type = interventionism value = 3 }
				NOT = { policy = { 	type = interventionism value = 4 } } 
				NOT = { local_flag = { which = MIL_level when = 0 value = 3 } }
			}
			AND = {
				policy = { 			type = interventionism value = 4 }
				NOT = { policy = { 	type = interventionism value = 5 } } 
				NOT = { local_flag = { which = MIL_level when = 0 value = 4 } }
			}
			AND = {
				policy = { 			type = interventionism value = 5 }
				NOT = { policy = { 	type = interventionism value = 6 } } 
				NOT = { local_flag = { which = MIL_level when = 0 value = 5 } }
			}
			AND = {
				policy = { 			type = interventionism value = 6 }
				NOT = { policy = { 	type = interventionism value = 7 } } 
				NOT = { local_flag = { which = MIL_level when = 0 value = 6 } }
			}
			AND = {
				policy = { 			type = interventionism value = 7 }
				NOT = { policy = { 	type = interventionism value = 8 } } 
				NOT = { local_flag = { which = MIL_level when = 0 value = 7 } }
			}
			AND = {
				policy = { 			type = interventionism value = 8 }
				NOT = { policy = { 	type = interventionism value = 9 } } 
				NOT = { local_flag = { which = MIL_level when = 0 value = 8 } }
			}
			AND = {
				policy = { 			type = interventionism value = 9 }
				NOT = { policy = { 	type = interventionism value = 10 } } 
				NOT = { local_flag = { which = MIL_level when = 0 value = 9 } }
			}
			AND = {
				policy = { type = interventionism value = 10 }
				NOT = { local_flag = { which = MIL_level when = 0 value = 10 } }
			}
		}
	}
	
	name = "Militarism level"
	desc = "Military tradition is a set of practices, values, and institutions which typically develop over the course of decades and sometimes centuries. It is built up both by deliberate government investment as well as actual experience of armed conflicts, and typically involves an emphasis on iron discipline and rigurous training, professional military academies promoting meritocracy and excellence of the officer corps, a system of universal conscription, and integration of the military into an overall culture of duty, honor, and loyalty. The result of all these investments is a military that is professional and able to punch considerably above its apparent weight and frequently surprise its opponents."
	style = 2
	picture = "news_paper"

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1913 }
	offset = 15
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = march year = 1963 }

	action = {
		name = ACTION_NAME_OK
		trigger = { policy = { type = interventionism value = 1 } NOT = { policy = { type = interventionism value = 2 } } }
		
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = MIL_level when = 0 value = 2 } } type = intelligence		 			which = them 					value = 2     }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = MIL_level when = 0 value = 2 } } type = army_detection				which = them 					value = 2     }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = MIL_level when = 0 value = 2 } } type = surprise 			 		which = naval 					value = -2    }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = MIL_level when = 0 value = 2 } } type = surprise 			 		which = land 					value = -2    }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = MIL_level when = 0 value = 2 } } type = surprise 			 		which = air 					value = -2    }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = MIL_level when = 0 value = 2 } } type = morale 				 		which = land					value = -2    }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = MIL_level when = 0 value = 2 } } type = defensiveness 				which = land 					value = 2     }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = MIL_level when = 0 value = 2 } } type = toughness 					which = land 					value = 2     }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = MIL_level when = 0 value = 2 } } type = task_efficiency 				which = Air_superiority 		value = -0.02 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = MIL_level when = 0 value = 2 } } type = task_efficiency 				which = Air_scramble 			value = -0.02 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = MIL_level when = 0 value = 2 } } type = task_efficiency 				which = Ground_attack 			value = -0.02 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = MIL_level when = 0 value = 2 } } type = task_efficiency 				which = interdiction 			value = -0.02 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = MIL_level when = 0 value = 2 } } type = task_efficiency 				which = convoy_air_raiding 		value = -0.02 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = MIL_level when = 0 value = 2 } } type = task_efficiency 				which = Naval_strike 			value = -0.02 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = MIL_level when = 0 value = 2 } } type = task_efficiency 				which = Strategic_bombardment 	value = -0.02 }

#War preparedness

event = {
	id = 3060
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	#invisible
	
	trigger = {
		NOT = { local_flag = { which = war_preparedness when = 1 value = 1 } }
		atwar = yes
		#at war with a major opponent
		OR = {
			war = { country = GER }
			war = { country = JAP }
			war = { country = ITA }
			war = { country = USA }
			war = { country = SOV }
			war = { country = FRA }
			war = { country = ENG }
			war = { country = CHI }
			war = { country = SPA }
			war = { country = SPR }
			war = { country = FIN } #and finland ;)
		}
		NOT = { 
			AND = {
				alliance = { country = CHC }
				war = { country = CHI }
				NOT = {
					war = { country = JAP }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				alliance = { country = CHC }
				war = { country = JAP }
				NOT = {
					alliance = { country = CHI }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				war = { country = CHC } 
				NOT = {
					war = { country = CHI }
					war = { country = JAP }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				OR = {
					country = FRA
					country = ENG
					puppet = { country = -1 country = FRA }
					puppet = { country = -1 country = ENG }
				}
				war = { country = GER }
				NOT = {
					war = { country = BEL }
					alliance = { country = BEL }
					war = { country = SCH }
					alliance = { country = SCH }
					region = { region = "France" country = -2 data = 1 value = 1 }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				war = { country = U87 } 
				NOT = {
					war = { country = CHI }
					war = { country = JAP }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				country = USA
				war = { country = GER }
				flag = GER_USA_undeclared_war
			}
			AND = {
				alliance = { country = SOV }
				war = { country = JAP }
				flag = SOV_JAP_undeclared_war
			}
			AND = {
				alliance = { country = JAP }
				war = { country = SOV }
				flag = SOV_JAP_undeclared_war
			}
			AND = {
				alliance = { country = SOV }
				war = { country = POL }
				NOT = { event =  2007019 }
			}
			AND = {
				OR = {
					country = FRA
					puppet = { country = -1 country = FRA }
				}
				war = { country = ENG }
				non_aggression = { country = FRA country = ENG }
			}
		}
	}
	
	name = "War preparedness"
	desc = "Despite our extensive preparations to face the enemy, when the war finally came to us, our military still turned out to be less prepared for a modern conflict than we would have liked to believe. Our troops were less organized than we thought and our officers of both senior and junior rank committed a number of embarassing errors during the opening phase of the conflict. This regrettably allowed the enemy to achieve some level of strategic surprise, and it took a few days before the situation began to normalize and our military effectiveness began to approach the levels we were hoping to see from the start. (Note that the strength and duration of the debuff is largely controlled by the 'militarism' level which determines military professionalism and peacetime readiness."
	style = 2
	picture = "news_paper"

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1913 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = march year = 1963 }

	action = {
		name = ACTION_NAME_DAMN
		trigger = { policy = { type = interventionism value = 1 } NOT = { policy = { type = interventionism value = 2 } } }
		
		command = { type = surprise 			 		which = naval 					value = -9    }
		command = { type = surprise 			 		which = land 					value = -9    }
		command = { type = surprise 			 		which = air 					value = -9    }
		command = { type = max_organization 			which = land 					value = -45   }
		command = { type = max_organization 			which = naval 					value = -45   }
		command = { type = max_organization 			which = air 					value = -27   }
		command = { type = morale 						which = land 					value = -18   }
		command = { type = morale 						which = naval 					value = -18   }
		command = { type = morale 						which = air 					value = -18   }
		command = { type = ground_def_eff 				when = 1						value = -0.27 }
		command = {	type = defensiveness 				which = land 					value = 45    }
		command = { type = toughness 					which = land 					value = 45    }
		command = { type = task_efficiency 				which = support_defense			value = -0.45 }
		command = { type = task_efficiency 				which = Air_superiority 		value = -0.45 }
		command = { type = task_efficiency 				which = Air_scramble 			value = -0.45 }
		command = { type = task_efficiency 				which = Ground_attack 			value = -0.45 }
		command = { type = task_efficiency 				which = interdiction 			value = -0.45 }
		command = { type = task_efficiency 				which = convoy_air_raiding 		value = -0.45 }
		command = { type = task_efficiency 				which = Naval_strike 			value = -0.45 }
		command = { type = task_efficiency 				which = Strategic_bombardment 	value = -0.45 }
		command = { type = task_efficiency 				which = Logistical_strike 		value = -0.45 }
		command = { type = task_efficiency 				which = Air_supply 				value = -0.45 }
		command = { type = task_efficiency 				which = Port_strike 			value = -0.45 }
		command = { type = task_efficiency 				which = Installation_strike 	value = -0.45 }
		command = { type = task_efficiency 				which = Runway_cratering 		value = -0.45 }
		
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { under_attack = -1 } }	type = event which = 3061	where = -1 when = 9  }
		command = { trigger = { under_attack = -1 } 			type = event which = 3061	where = -1 when = 18 }
		
		command = { 											type = event which = 3062	where = -1 when = 360  } #1 year

		command = { type = local_setflag which = war_preparedness when = 0 value = 1 }
		command = { type = local_setflag which = war_preparedness_debuff }
		command = { type = local_setflag which = MIL_Increasing }
	}
	action = {
		name = ACTION_NAME_DAMN
		trigger = { policy = { type = interventionism value = 2 } NOT = { policy = { type = interventionism value = 3 } } }

		command = { 											type = event which = 3062	where = -1 when = 720  } #2 years

		command = { type = local_setflag which = war_preparedness when = 0 value = 2 }

event = {
	id = 3061
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	#invisible
	
	name = "Organization improves"
	desc = "Despite our extensive preparations to face the enemy, when the war finally came to us, our military still turned out to be less prepared for a modern conflict than we would have liked to believe. Still, experience is the best teacher, and after the few initial blunders, the organization and combat capacity of our troops began to gradually recover. The question is whether or not our early blunders will have lost us the initiative in this conflict for the forseeable future."
	style = 2
	picture = "news_paper"

event = {
	id = 3062
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	
	name = "Military tradition increases"
	desc = "Military tradition is a set of practices, values, and institutions which typically develop over the course of decades and sometimes centuries. It is built up both by deliberate government investment as well as actual experience of armed conflicts, and typically involves an emphasis on iron discipline and rigurous training, professional military academies promoting meritocracy and excellence of the officer corps, a system of universal conscription, and integration of the military into an overall culture of duty, honor, and loyalty. If our country participates in a major armed conflict, our military tradition will slowly increase as a result."
	style = 2
	picture = "news_paper"

	action = {
		name = ACTION_NAME_EXCELLENT
		trigger = {	local_flag = MIL_increasing local_flag = war_preparedness }
		
		command = { trigger = { policy = { type = interventionism value = 1 } NOT = { policy = { type = interventionism value = 2  } } } type = event which = 3062	where = -1 when = 720  } #1 years
		command = { trigger = { policy = { type = interventionism value = 2 } NOT = { policy = { type = interventionism value = 3  } } } type = event which = 3062	where = -1 when = 1080 } #2 years
		command = { trigger = { policy = { type = interventionism value = 3 } NOT = { policy = { type = interventionism value = 4  } } } type = event which = 3062	where = -1 when = 1440 } #3 years
		command = { trigger = { policy = { type = interventionism value = 4 } NOT = { policy = { type = interventionism value = 5  } } } type = event which = 3062	where = -1 when = 1800 } #4 years
		command = { trigger = { policy = { type = interventionism value = 5 } NOT = { policy = { type = interventionism value = 6  } } } type = event which = 3062	where = -1 when = 2160 } #5 years
		command = { trigger = { policy = { type = interventionism value = 6 } NOT = { policy = { type = interventionism value = 7  } } } type = event which = 3062	where = -1 when = 2520 } #6 years
		command = { trigger = { policy = { type = interventionism value = 7 } NOT = { policy = { type = interventionism value = 8  } } } type = event which = 3062	where = -1 when = 2880 } #7 years
		command = { trigger = { policy = { type = interventionism value = 8 } NOT = { policy = { type = interventionism value = 9  } } } type = event which = 3062	where = -1 when = 3240 } #8 years
		
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = 1 }
	}
	action = {
		name = "The war ended before we could learn anything"
		trigger = { local_flag = MIL_increasing	NOT = { local_flag = war_preparedness } }
		
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MIL_Increasing }
	}
}


#Stockpile reduction based on IC loss

event = {
	id = 3070
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	#invisible
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
				OR = {
					NOT = { lost_IC = { value = 10 } } 
					AND = {
						lost_IC = { value = 100 }
						NOT = { lost_national = { value = 10 } }
					}
				}
				OR = {
					NOT = { policy = { 	type = free_market	value = 1 } } 
							policy = { 	type = free_market 	value = 2 }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				lost_IC = { value = 10 } 
				NOT = { lost_IC = { value = 20 } } 
				OR = {
					NOT = { policy = { 	type = free_market	value = 2 } } 
							policy = {	type = free_market	value = 3 }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				lost_IC = { value = 20 } 
				NOT = { lost_IC = { value = 30 } } 
				OR = {
					NOT = { policy = { 	type = free_market	value = 3 } } 
							policy = {	type = free_market	value = 4 }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				lost_IC = { value = 30 } 
				NOT = { lost_IC = { value = 40 } } 
				OR = {
					NOT = { policy = { 	type = free_market	value = 4 } } 
							policy = {	type = free_market	value = 5 }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				lost_IC = { value = 40 } 
				NOT = { lost_IC = { value = 50 } } 
				OR = {
					NOT = { policy = { 	type = free_market	value = 5 } } 
							policy = {	type = free_market	value = 6 }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				lost_IC = { value = 50 } 
				NOT = { lost_IC = { value = 60 } } 
				OR = {
					NOT = { policy = { 	type = free_market	value = 6 } } 
							policy = {	type = free_market	value = 7 }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				lost_IC = { value = 60 } 
				NOT = { lost_IC = { value = 70 } } 
				OR = {
					NOT = { policy = { 	type = free_market	value = 7 } } 
							policy = {	type = free_market	value = 8 }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				lost_IC = { value = 70 } 
				NOT = { lost_IC = { value = 80 } } 
				OR = {
					NOT = { policy = { 	type = free_market	value = 8 } } 
							policy = {	type = free_market	value = 9 }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				lost_IC = { value = 80 } 
				NOT = { lost_IC = { value = 90 } } 
				OR = {
					NOT = { policy = { 	type = free_market	value = 9 } } 
							policy = {	type = free_market	value = 10 }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				OR = {
					lost_IC = { value = 90 } 
					AND = {
						lost_IC = { value = 50 } 
						NOT = { ic = { value = 4 } }
					}
				}
				OR = {
					NOT = {	lost_IC = { value = 100 } }	
					lost_national = { value = 10 }
				}
				OR = {
					NOT = { policy = { 	type = free_market	value = 10 } } 
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	name = "Storage sites overrun"
	desc = "As enemy forces advance, they are overruning not just our factories by our fuel and grain silos, material wearhouses, and ammunition depots. We are making sure to blow up the contents of whatever resources we can't evacuate to deny it to the enemy, but alas, we also lose those resources which we worked so hard to accumulate."
	style = 2
	picture = "news_paper"

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1913 }
	offset = 3
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = march year = 1963 }

	action = {
		name = "No storage is lost"
		trigger = { 
			OR = {
				NOT = { lost_IC = { value = 10 } } 
				AND = {
					lost_IC = { value = 100 }
					NOT = { lost_national = { value = 10 } }
				}
			}
			OR = {
				NOT = { policy = { 	type = free_market	value = 1 } } 
						policy = { 	type = free_market 	value = 2 }
			}
		}
		#command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = storageLost when = 0 value = 2 } } 	type = stockpile which = industry when = all value =  5  }
		#command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = storageLost when = 0 value = 3 } } 	type = stockpile which = industry when = all value =  10 }
		#command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = storageLost when = 0 value = 4 } } 	type = stockpile which = industry when = all value =  15 }
		#command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = storageLost when = 0 value = 5 } } 	type = stockpile which = industry when = all value =  20 }
		#command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = storageLost when = 0 value = 6 } } 	type = stockpile which = industry when = all value =  25 }
		#command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = storageLost when = 0 value = 7 } } 	type = stockpile which = industry when = all value =  30 }
		#command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = storageLost when = 0 value = 8 } } 	type = stockpile which = industry when = all value =  35 }
		#command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = storageLost when = 0 value = 9 } } 	type = stockpile which = industry when = all value =  40 }
		#command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = storageLost when = 0 value = 10 } }	type = stockpile which = industry when = all value =  45 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = storageLost when = 0 value = 2 } } 	type = stockpile which = supplies when = all value =  11 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = storageLost when = 0 value = 3 } } 	type = stockpile which = supplies when = all value =  22 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = storageLost when = 0 value = 4 } } 	type = stockpile which = supplies when = all value =  33 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = storageLost when = 0 value = 5 } } 	type = stockpile which = supplies when = all value =  44 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = storageLost when = 0 value = 6 } } 	type = stockpile which = supplies when = all value =  55 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = storageLost when = 0 value = 7 } } 	type = stockpile which = supplies when = all value =  66 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = storageLost when = 0 value = 8 } } 	type = stockpile which = supplies when = all value =  77 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = storageLost when = 0 value = 9 } } 	type = stockpile which = supplies when = all value =  88 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = storageLost when = 0 value = 10 } }	type = stockpile which = supplies when = all value =  99 }
		
		#command = { 																		type = stockpile which = industry when = all value = -0  }
		#command = { 																		type = stockpile which = supplies when = all value = -0  }
		
		command = { type = set_domestic which = free_market value = 1 }
		command = { type = local_setflag which = storageLost when = 0 value = 1 }
	}
	action = {
		name = "Over 10% of storage is lost"
		trigger = { 
			lost_IC = { value = 10 } 
			NOT = { lost_IC = { value = 20 } } 
			OR = {
				NOT = { policy = { 	type = free_market	value = 2 } } 
						policy = {	type = free_market	value = 3 }
			}
		}
		#command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = storageLost when = 0 value = 2 } } 	type = stockpile which = industry when = all value =  5  }
		#command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = storageLost when = 0 value = 3 } } 	type = stockpile which = industry when = all value =  10 }
		#command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = storageLost when = 0 value = 4 } } 	type = stockpile which = industry when = all value =  15 }
		#command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = storageLost when = 0 value = 5 } } 	type = stockpile which = industry when = all value =  20 }
		#command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = storageLost when = 0 value = 6 } } 	type = stockpile which = industry when = all value =  25 }
		#command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = storageLost when = 0 value = 7 } } 	type = stockpile which = industry when = all value =  30 }
		#command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = storageLost when = 0 value = 8 } } 	type = stockpile which = industry when = all value =  35 }
		#command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = storageLost when = 0 value = 9 } } 	type = stockpile which = industry when = all value =  40 }
		#command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = storageLost when = 0 value = 10 } }	type = stockpile which = industry when = all value =  45 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = storageLost when = 0 value = 2 } } 	type = stockpile which = supplies when = all value =  11 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = storageLost when = 0 value = 3 } } 	type = stockpile which = supplies when = all value =  22 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = storageLost when = 0 value = 4 } } 	type = stockpile which = supplies when = all value =  33 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = storageLost when = 0 value = 5 } } 	type = stockpile which = supplies when = all value =  44 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = storageLost when = 0 value = 6 } } 	type = stockpile which = supplies when = all value =  55 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = storageLost when = 0 value = 7 } } 	type = stockpile which = supplies when = all value =  66 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = storageLost when = 0 value = 8 } } 	type = stockpile which = supplies when = all value =  77 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = storageLost when = 0 value = 9 } } 	type = stockpile which = supplies when = all value =  88 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = storageLost when = 0 value = 10 } }	type = stockpile which = supplies when = all value =  99 }
		
		#command = { 																		type = stockpile which = industry when = all value = -5  }
		command = { 																		type = stockpile which = supplies when = all value = -11 }

	action = {
		name = "Over 90% of storage is lost"
		trigger = { 
			OR = {
				lost_IC = { value = 90 } 
				AND = {
					lost_IC = { value = 50 } 
					NOT = { ic = { value = 4 } }
				}
			}
			OR = {
				NOT = {	lost_IC = { value = 100 } }
				lost_national = { value = 10 }
			}
			NOT = { policy = { 	type = free_market	value = 10 } } 
		}
		#command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = storageLost when = 0 value = 2 } } 	type = stockpile which = industry when = all value =  5  }
		#command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = storageLost when = 0 value = 3 } } 	type = stockpile which = industry when = all value =  10 }

		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = storageLost when = 0 value = 7 } } 	type = stockpile which = supplies when = all value =  66 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = storageLost when = 0 value = 8 } } 	type = stockpile which = supplies when = all value =  77 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = storageLost when = 0 value = 9 } } 	type = stockpile which = supplies when = all value =  88 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = storageLost when = 0 value = 10 } }	type = stockpile which = supplies when = all value =  99 }
		
		#command = { 																		type = stockpile which = industry when = all value = -45 }
		command = { 																		type = stockpile which = supplies when = all value = -99 }
		
		command = { type = set_domestic which = free_market value = 10 }
		command = { type = local_setflag which = storageLost when = 0 value = 10 }
	}
}


#Civilian oil consumption
#Disabled
#Very difficult to properly simulate given the vastly different types of economies. 
#some economies use a lot more oil for civilian use while others rely on coal or other energy sources. 
#Conversion goes only one way now - energy can be converted into oil, but oil cannot be used for energy.
#Need to think what to do about overall oil production volumes which don't really make sense right now

event = {
	id = 3080
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	#invisible
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
				ic = 10
				NOT = { ic = 20 }
				policy = { type = freedom value = 1 }
				NOT = { policy = { type = freedom value = 2 } }
				NOT = { local_flag = { which = oilCiv when = 0 value = 0 } }
			}
			AND = {
				ic = 10

		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = oilCiv when = 0 value = 800 } }	type = free_oil value = -800 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = oilCiv when = 0 value = 801 } }	type = free_oil value = -801 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = oilCiv when = 0 value = 810 } }	type = free_oil value = -810 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = oilCiv when = 0 value = 819 } }	type = free_oil value = -819 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = oilCiv when = 0 value = 828 } }	type = free_oil value = -828 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = { which = oilCiv when = 0 value = 837 } }	type = free_oil value = -837 }

}
